comments: Well its been a little over 36 hours and I don't enjoy this app. The first 16 hours it was great! Reminded me to drink every 2 hours. I've been awake since 07:00, and not once have I been reminded to drink. So I'm deleting this and will find a hopefully better app to remind me. I lead a super busy life and the reminders are so welcomed and I was beyond excited at first that this app delivered said reminders. Sad it didn't work out.

Really good app it reminds me to drink as I tend not to drink a lot during the day ,its made me realised that yes I do need to ,dry skin headaches and also you can get water infection by not drinking enough , so I use the alarm on here ,which you can set yourself as to when you need to drink fluid. So yes good app

So downloaded the app to track what I drink and different sorts. However after 1 day I've noticed that the main page doesn't tally the quantity properly. Ive been drinking in rounded amounts 250 or 500ml but its telling me I have drank 2253ml out of 2500ml, however I've actually drank 3000ml (4x250ml and 4x500ml). Yet the graph is correct. Think this needs to be addressed. However i do like that i can log different drinks
Brilliant app, I always put this one on my phone, it's surprising how much better you feel when taking in the correct amount of water.😁

This app is just what I needed. Due to medical issues, sometimes I don't feel thirsty even when I'm having other symptoms of dehydration, but this app will help me to drink enough fluids throughout the day.

title: Water Tracker: Water Drinking Reminder App
description:
If you wish to stay fit, get in shape, or get clearer skin or all of these, then drink enough water. Only changing your habit from having soft drinks and packaged juices to aqua can bring unlimited advantages not only physically, but also mentally. There are so many Benefits of Drinking Water! One is Aqua hydration.

This Water Tracker: H2O Drinking Reminder App will help you to keep track of water intake per day! It also helps you to fulfill your recommended daily water goal! Now even if you miss out on drinking water in your busy schedule, take advantage of a Water Reminder App that reminds you to drink water at your pre-defined time.

Water is the most essential thing to survive. It’s possible to live for a while without food, but water is a different story. Our bodies are about 60% aqua. That’s why it’s so important to drink plenty of water and replace the fluids that we lose during the day.. 

Smart features of this water reminder app:

💧 Set a desired goal for Water Consumption & keep a track with drinking water calculator
💧 Water report of weekly, monthly, yearly for Water Consumption goal achievement!
💧 Check progress with water intake reminder to achieve your desired target.
💧 Enter Body weight & Daily Water intake measurement unit (kg or lbs, ml or ozal)
💧 Different DateTime formats are also available for Daily Water Consumption graph
💧 Water Drinking Reminder with alarm to ensure water balance in body!
💧 Aqua level selection is customizable for implementing water counter successfully!

In this Water intake calculator App, just enter your gender, age, weight, the goal for water consumption & type of activity (Sedentary, Light Active, Moderately Active, Very Active or Extremely Active). Then after, this Hydration Tracker App will automatically start tracking your recommended water intake!

Keeping track of your needs and making sure your body is well hydrated, is not an easy task in today's busy schedule. This drink water tracker app will help you to stay fit and hydrated every day! Stay fit with Water Tracker: Water Drinking Reminder App.

This Water Drink log is divided into two categories:

Overview:

Using this section of Water log, you can easily keep track of water intake per day by monitoring the progress from the water report. You can add the amount of liquid that you have drunk & from that, this Water Intake Tracker app will calculate the total amount that is consumed during the time. It also gives a percentage value of completed Daily Water Intake target!

You can add the consumed quantity by using ‘+’ sign. It displays time wise water consumption per day! You can choose your desired quantity from the given different vessel types! You can also customize them as required.

Statistics:

This section of the Water Tracker App helps you to keep track of water report on a daily basis! It also gives you weekly & monthly average reports, average completion, and daily Drink Water balance frequency! Encouragement is always necessary to achieve goals and for that purpose, Water Intake goal achievement is also given in this app!

Track your achievements regularly and try to become a winner! Show it to your near and dear ones & give them a water challenge!

Many times, it happens that we don’t remember to drink water in our busy schedule! Isn’t it? Now it’ll become easy to Drink Water at your preferable time intervals with this water intake tracker & smart water logger app. then also you can keep a track on your daily water intake goal easily!

This Water Reminder App will help you to Drink Water at regular intervals and keep your hydration maintained! Track your Recommended Water Intake habits and increase it with the help of notifications.

Now, DON’T FORGET TO DRINK WATER! And whenever you do, take out a minute to check water intake daily with this Water Tracker app! STAY HYDRATED. Do share your results with us!

💧 Set a desired goal for Water Consumption & keep a track with drinking water calculator
💧 Water report of weekly, monthly, yearly for Water Consumption goal achievement!
💧 Check progress with water intake reminder to achieve your desired target.
💧 Enter Body weight & Daily Water intake measurement unit (kg or lbs, ml or ozal)
💧 Different DateTime formats are also available for Daily Water Consumption graph
💧 Water Drinking Reminder with alarm to ensure water balance in body!
💧 Aqua level selection is customizable for implementing water counter successfully!

In this Water intake calculator App, just enter your gender, age, weight, the goal for water consumption & type of activity (Sedentary, Light Active, Moderately Active, Very Active or Extremely Active). Then after, this Hydration Tracker App will automatically start tracking your recommended water intake!

Keeping track of your needs and making sure your body is well hydrated, is not an easy task in today's busy schedule. This drink water tracker app will help you to stay fit and hydrated every day! Stay fit with Water Tracker: Water Drinking Reminder App.

This Water Drink log is divided into two categories:

Overview:

Using this section of Water log, you can easily keep track of water intake per day by monitoring the progress from the water report. You can add the amount of liquid that you have drunk & from that, this Water Intake Tracker app will calculate the total amount that is consumed during the time. It also gives a percentage value of completed Daily Water Intake target!

You can add the consumed quantity by using ‘+’ sign. It displays time wise water consumption per day! You can choose your desired quantity from the given different vessel types! You can also customize them as required.

Statistics:

This section of the Water Tracker App helps you to keep track of water report on a daily basis! It also gives you weekly & monthly average reports, average completion, and daily Drink Water balance frequency! Encouragement is always necessary to achieve goals and for that purpose, Water Intake goal achievement is also given in this app!

Track your achievements regularly and try to become a winner! Show it to your near and dear ones & give them a water challenge!

Many times, it happens that we don’t remember to drink water in our busy schedule! Isn’t it? Now it’ll become easy to Drink Water at your preferable time intervals with this water intake tracker & smart water logger app. then also you can keep a track on your daily water intake goal easily!

This Water Reminder App will help you to Drink Water at regular intervals and keep your hydration maintained! Track your Recommended Water Intake habits and increase it with the help of notifications.

Now, DON’T FORGET TO DRINK WATER! And whenever you do, take out a minute to check water intake daily with this Water Tracker app! STAY HYDRATED. Do share your results with us!

title: Drink Water Reminder - Water Alarm & Tracker
description:
Our body contains 70% parts of water and it is necessary that we maintain the ratio in our body to be fit and healthy. Drinking less water causes many health related issues.

Water reminder app reminds you to drink water on regular intervals, so you can not forget to drink and be healthy and hydrated. Sometimes we are too busy in our work that we forget to drink water and our body will dehydrate sometimes especially in summer so this app is very useful to maintain the ratio of water in our body.

MAIN FEATURES:
- You can set the interval to remind drinking water
- You can set your Daily target, Choose the measurement unit like 50ml, 100ml upto 1000ml measurement unit.
- You can feel the daily target and manage to receive notification after 100% target achieved.
- Managing the history of daily water consumption.
- Graphical view of daily consumption
- Manage settings of the apps dynamically.

Home: 
- Check you daily intake
- Set measurement unit

HISTORY: 
- Check day wise history
- Detailed history of intake

GRAPH: 
- Graphical view of daily water intake

SETTINGS: 
- Set different reminder sound 
- Set Alert type like Notification / Popup dialog / No alert (Mute alert notification)
- Set Wakeup and sleep time so alarm will not buzz during that time period. 
- Set you daily need 
- Set the time interval to intake the water.

title: Waterify – Water Drink Reminder
description:
Are you looking for an amazing water tracker reminder and alarm app? You can also track water history, reach your daily goal to open the respective achievements, and many other useful functions. Download our water reminder daily tracker app now and get reminded to drink water on time and stay hydrated. You’re going to love it.

Water is the main component of the human body; it has many distinct properties that are critical for the proliferation of life. All known forms of life depend on water. Water is vital both as a solvent in which many of the body's solutes dissolve and also an essential part of many metabolic processes within the body. Use our Water drink reminder logger app every day for water logging and witness a full body cleanse and heal life over time and never let yourself be thirsty.

Every day we get so busy with our daily routines that we do not take the steps necessary to be introspective. In our day-to-day life due to busy schedules, drinking water regularly can be challenging, despite its numerous health benefits. Waterify - Water tracker drink app makes it easier to stay hydrated. It may even help you lose weight and prevent certain illnesses like dizziness, kidney stones, and diabetes.

Our goal is to provide everything you need to help you boost brain power, flush out toxins, prevent headaches, reduce low back pain, and make you full of energy.

Why you should download and install Waterify - Water Drink Reminder on your android smart phone?
- Waterify – Water Drink Reminder is very easy to use so you just need to install it for free on your phone.

- Waterify – Water Drink Reminder provides premium app features to remove ads, easily take backups and restore them when needed and log water for elapsed dates.

Benefits of drinking water:
- Stays in shape and keeps fit as clean water is calorie-free
- Helps you speed up metabolism
- Let’s you stay hydrated and prevent dehydration
- Clears up your skin and keeps your nails healthy
- Helps prevent kidney stones
- Useful for diabetes prevention

How to use?
- Choose language [English - French - German - Hindi - Spanish]
- Enter your name and select gender

- Select other factors
- Set your weather condition

Waterify – Water Drink Reminder is a new refreshment in this popular app’s category. If you want to get reminded and never let yourself be thirsty, you'll love our water drink reminder app.

Quick and easy to use: intuitive and quick to keep track of your fluid intake, just one or two taps to record each drink. You can also programme in your usual drinks for future use. There are also different images for your drinks which helps you to check that you've recorded your last drink.

This app is very helpful to keep you hydrated. It reminds you to drink water on preset reminders. It is very helpful if your schedule is hectic and you forgot to drink water. Highly recommended. 5 stars!

title: Drink Water Reminder and Hydration Tracker - BeWet
description:
The convenient reminder to drink water on time and body hydration tracker for those who want to lose weight, adjust the water balance of the body, improve metabolism, or for those who forget to drink water throughout the day.

Water is very important in our body. Do you know that one glass of water easily awakens the body after sleep and one is enough to lighten your mood or calm down. Regular consumption of water helps to improve health and normalize metabolism. Water helps you lose weight because there are no calories in the water.

Lack of water in the body entails many negative effects, such as headache, deterioration of health and skin color, irritability, etc. But with reminders to drink water it does not threaten you since we will always remind you when you need to drink water.

⏰ Reminders when to drink
You can use auto or set the manual time settings when reminders should be arrive to drink water.

🍹 Drinks
Tea, coffee, juice, milk, etc. Track water or your favorite drinks and their hydration indices to correctly calculate water saturation.

💧 How much to drink water per day
Enter your current weight and application will help you determine how much water your body needs every day.

☀ Weather and training
Depending on the weather and physical activity, the application will adjust a daily target.

⚖ Weight Control
Track your weight and body mass index. Great tool for losing weight.

👌 Convenience
Customize a most used volumes for quickly adds a new intakes. Choose your own or several of our melodies for reminders. You can also set reminders sound plays on the alarm volume.

📊 Statistics and 📖 History
Track amount of water and drinks you drink per week, a month or even a year.

Hydrate yourself and stay in shape with reminders drink water!

comments: Good app for trying to get more hydrated as it reminds me when I need to drink water or other liquids. All the reminders help keep track and for me motivation to drink more water because that's something we can all do better. So many people are dehydrated in our society it's a app worth trying there are many different similar apps this one works for me.

Very good app, except that I need to be able to enter an hydration Index of over 100% and that's not possible. Milk, for example, has an index of up to 158%. Also, most already saved values are wrong, as shown by a study in 2016.
Thank you for fixing the issue with Google drive backup! I had switched to another app for my water tracking. But as the issue is now fixed, I am back to BeWet.
I always forget to drink water, and have actually ended up seriously sick because of it before. This app works wonderfully to remind me, and I adore it so much
This is a great way to track hydration but I can't agree with allowing coffee and tea as hydrating the body. Caffeine dehydrates.

comments: This app could be great if not for the fact that the ads completely block the buttons to add the water you drink. It defeats the purpose. If they move the ads to the top of the screen this app would actually be great.

I love it! Simple, fun, and motivational. I enjoy the inspiring image of a body filling up with water as you add ounces, and how confetti goes flying every time you add towards reaching your goal. There's also notifications you can set to remind yourself every hour on the hour to drink water. I'm trying the free 7 day trial, then I'll likely pay for continued full use. Good job for the visually appealing and motivational app.

Update 7/21/19 I used to love this app. After the upgrade it doesn't work though. Paid for the "life time ad removal" years ago when I first got the app. With the upgrade it doesn't register I've paid. June 30th I emailed them to let them know about the problem. Got emailed back to use "restore" button, which did nothing. I let them know. Got a reply to be on for a 5 min time frame to "purchase for free" at a time I didn't see email. Have emailed several times since with no reply or fix.

This app could be useful. I don't mind ad supported apps, but when ads COMPLETELY block the bottom portion of the app where there are buttons necessary for use, it's absurd. I will not pay to remove ads in an app that I cannot test because of (purposefully?) inconveniently placed ads. Uninstalling and looking for another.
Interface is clean and simple. App just didn't work, in that I could not add any entries after the initial configuration.

title: Water Diet Plan
description:
The Water Diet, sometimes known as the Cold Water Diet, is one of the latest fads that appeal to dieters who want to melt away their fat. Compared to fasting "cleanse" diets and those that restrict caloric intake, such as the Rice Diet, the Water Diet doesn't limit food consumption, nor does it require exercise. The appeal of the Water Diet is that dieters can purportedly eat what they want--and still lose weight.

The exact origin of the Water Diet is unknown. Some Internet resources trace the diet to an article written and published in 1997 by the Institute for Psychoactive Research in Durham, North Carolina, while Douglas Silver Porter, purportedly a "doctor and a scientist," also lays claim to inventing the Water Diet.

It's not actually a diet—there are no restrictions on what you eat, the only stipulation is that water must be cold when you drink it. The body burns extra calories heating up ice-cold water to the normal body temperature of 98.6 degrees. (The colder the water the more calories burned).

How the Diet Works
On the Water Diet, the dieter drinks 64 oz. of cool or cold water in eight 8-oz. servings over the course of the day, with or without meals, in addition to the dieter's normal fluid intake. The water can be tap water, bottled water or any other kind of water that is safe to drink. The available resources on the Water Diet discourages chewing on ice cubes to make up for water intake. The Water Diet does not alter the types of foods the dieter eats, nor does it limit portion size. Exercise is not a component of the Water Diet.

More feature;
# Overview about the apps
# Water Diet Guides plan (Sample of Meal plan)
# Benefits of water Diet
# Side effect of drinking water too much
# Water Diet Tips
# Who should not fast
# How to do a Water diet : step 1
# How to do a Water diet : step 2
# How to do a Water diet : step 3
# 19 Water - rich foods that help you stay hydrated
# 12 sample ways to drink more water
# Water Fasting
# Goal Tracker
# BMI Calculator
# Apps info
# Water Fasting

Feedback:-
If you have any suggested features or improvement, please leave a comment. In case something is not working correctly please let me know. When posting low rating please describe what is wrong to give the possibility to fix that issue.

Ads--
There are ads in this app. Images for this app are stored on the internet and this costs money. application is free, it does not promote paid version of this app, the only way to support future development is to include ads. Please treat that with understanding.

IMPORTANT NOTES:
The water diet is best for a short amount of time. It is safest when combined with a normal diet, and can be dangerous when combined with fasting. The water diet may not be safe for everyone. When doing a water fast, you risk symptoms of low blood sugar like dizziness and fatigue, not to mention constipation, dehydration, and an intolerance of cold temperatures. If you know you struggle with low blood sugar, the water diet may not be for you. This type of diet is a short term diet means once you lose the weight, as soon as you go off of it, the weight comes back. 


Finally we wish you a great success on your diet journey!

title: Drink Water Reminder - Daily Water Tracker, Record
description:
Do you always forget to drink water regularly?
What would happen if you don’t drink enough water?

Our body is about 60% water, give or take. Water is essential to our life, but we are constantly losing water from our body through breathing, sweating, and urinating. Drinking enough water is vital to prevent dehydration. But because of bad memory or busy work, the day may end before we drink enough water.

Drink Water Reminder messages you to finish enough water intakes to stay hydrated every day. Drink Water Reminder helps you keep good water drinking habit and find unexpected benefits for health. 

Drink Water Reminder Key Features
💧 Customize your daily hydration schedule
There are many different opinions on how much water you should be drinking every day. Drink Water Reminder will not calculate your hydration amount by weight or height like other apps, just set your ideal daily water drinking plan, Drink Water Reminder will notify you drink when it’s time and help you finish daily hydration plan.

🔔 Help you to reach daily hydration goal
 Notifications and reminders to remember you to drink water as you prefer on reasonable time duration and will not remind you in sleep time. Help you to keep enough water intakes for your body and keep fit.

🏆  Record your daily water intake
Drink Water Reminder will remind you to drink via notification; just touch to log each drinking manually to make sure each glass of water drunk will be recorded. Drink Water Reminder will keep your every record and generate report for you to do review or analysis.

💧 Track different drink's water share
Drinks contain water with different percentage so they are hydrating. Drink Water Reminder will record almost all drink’s water share: milk, coffee, fruit juice, beer, soda, tea, soft drinks, canned soups…to make your water intakes data more accurate.

📈  Chart your water drinking history
Check graphic display of your hydration level and daily consumption by day, week and year. We will add more drinking analysis data to help you understand more about yourself. 

 Health benefits of drinking enough water 
+Water helps you speed up metabolism.
+ Drinking more water helps you lose weight, stay in shape as clean water diet is calorie free. 
+ Water can help in kidney stone, constipation, diabetes and more illnesses prevention.
+ Proper hydration keeps your nails clean and healthy. 
+ Water can help hydrate the skin and reduce acne.
+ Drinking more water provides general health benefits.

Do not wait to be thirsty before you get some H2O, since thirst is a signal that your body is in dehydration already.

Keep hydrated, keep energetic, and keep healthy.

Stay with us 
Email: drinkwatereminder@gmail.com
Please let us know any of your feedback or feature suggestion as review, this would help a lot. We are here working on to improving. 

Support Languages
English, German, French, Japanese, Portuguese, Spanish, Chinese(Simplified), Chinese (Traditional), Arabic, Russian, Italian, Hungarian

Thank you for using this water tracker app!

title: Drink Water Reminder - Beverage Tracker
description:
Water Reminder - Beverage Tracker is the most innovative and well designed app in its category 💦

🤔Do you drink enough water?
🤔Do you always forget to drink water regularly?
🤔Are you in good shape and correct weight range?
🤔Would you like to lose weight with less effort?
🤔Do you need a water reminder every hour?
🤔Do you consider daily proper hydration?
🤔Do you need an hydro coach or motivator?
🤔Do you know that proper hydration keeps your skin healthy and helps you lose weight ?
🤔Do you wonder how much coffee, milk, juice or coke you drink per day/week/month?

Then, this water reminder and beverage tracker app is for you. It will remind you to drink water every day. 

Also you can track various liquid types such as milk, coffee, tea, beer, coke.

A beverage tracker app to help you develop good habits of drinking water!

Drink Water Reminder helps you get an appropriate intake of water every day. 

Total daily water intake is the sum of water content coming from all types of beverages and foods.

This is a beverage tracker app that helps you improve your habits of drinking. 

Very detailed calculation of daily water intake is in this application. By entering your current weight, height, age and activity level,  Water Reminder will help you determine how much water your body needs every day. Remember to log each time you drink a cup of water or the other beverages. Then the app will remind you when it's time for another drink. When you enable water reminders, hydration coach not only tracks what you drink, but also reminds you when it's time for another drink.

Benefits of water
❇️Stay in shape and keep fit with water
❇️Clears up your skin
❇️Keeps your skin and nails healthy
❇️Helps prevent kidney stones
❇️Keeps you hydrated

 Key Features of the water reminder app 
💧Water tracker that will remind you when and how much water to drink
💧Different type of cups and standard (oz) or metric (ml) units
💧You can set your start and end time to drink water for each day
💧Graph and logs of your habit
💧Track your daily water intake from many type of beverages
💧Special beverage meter helps you to log precise amount of drink
💧Analysis daily, weekly and monthly
💧Share your water intake history with your friends or your doctor

Don't forget to rate and share if you like our app.

comments: Very helpful app for monitoring liquid consumption. I enjoy it for the most part except for two minor irks. title: Waterbalance
description:
Waterbalance is an easy-to-use and functional mobile application to help you track your water balance based on the individual parameters: height, weight, age and lifestyle, with the daily schedule and plans considered. 
The application will become your reliable friend and advisor and will help you control the water balance turning water drinking into a healthy habit. Your body will be really grateful to you!

Here is a new incentive to download the latest version of Waterbalance app. Now you can use your Wear OS smartwatch to add the drinks you’ve consumed during the day. The only catch is that you should add your first drink from the app itself before you can start tracking daily intake all from your wrist.

comments: Doesn't count the water quantity properly. I've added two drinks 580 ml total to the journal. The app shows only 280 ml on the main screen.
Pretty good so far, but I'm surprised that white coffee in an option, but white tea isn't. Other than that, the interface is nice and clean, easy to use, I like it.

I'm honestly liking this app after 1 full day- but I'm really irked that I can't add more than 20 ounces of water at a time. I have two different size water bottles. None of which are 20oz or below. One size is 24oz; the other 32oz. I have multiple of each size. I will not be buying any 20oz bottle(s) to comply with this restrictive function of the app. I may delete it, if I get too irritated with having to make more than one entry per finished water bottle. Lame.

Good but... I would give 5 stars but the notifications are every 2 hours which I believe is far too long in between each drink (for me) to be able to get in all 2+ltrs per day and there's no option to change it. The notifications are also silent! That is pointless for me if I dont have my phone in my hand at the time. It would be great to have the option to change settings for notofications - some more variations would take this to a 5 star rating. X
This app is a great idea, because I organized my waterbalance daily.

title: Drink Water Reminder & Tracker for Hydration
description:
Monitor and record your water diet/water intake with Water Tracker & Reminder. Simple and best way to track your daily water intake. Our water tracker is an efficient tool that works as a water reminder, which means it reminds you to stay hydrated. 

Optimistic studies reveal that proper hydration is essential for your body and skin health, and even it will help to lose extra flab! However, this water reminder app is a natural assistant that will motivate you to drink water daily. Keep in mind; about 50-70 % of the body mass is made up of water that includes skin, tissues, cells, and the organs. So, utilize our simple water calculator to track your daily water intake. In general speaking, this drink water reminder will remind you about the drink water in time; actually, it recommends the amount of fluid that you should have to intake for proper hydration. The fluid/liquid intake includes tea, coffee, juice, milk and energy drink or you can create your own to stay hydrated. You just have to enter your gender and weight into this optimal daily water tracker; it recommends you the amount of water you need to consume. Additionally, this hydration app concerns your wake-up and sleep time to pop-up the notifications daily, and you can set the notification time interval in this water tracker app.

If you forget to drink water, then our efficient hydration app pop-up the notification to prevent dehydration.  Before knowing about the features of our water reminder app, you should beware of the importance of water. Yes – drinking an adequate amount of water is immensely important for your health!

Benefits of Drinking Water:
•	Approximately 50 to 70 percent of the body mass depends on your water intake
•	Dehydration doesn’t support the vital functions of your body, so you need to consume enough amount of water
•	Water is the natural assistant that removes the toxins and waste products from your body
•	Water is essential to process all the nutrients from the food that you consume
•	Dehydration or lack of water is a condition that leads to constipation, asthma, allergy, migraine, hypertension and various health problems
•	Keep in mind; we lose water through perspiration, urine, breath, and bowel movements daily. Thus, there is a need to consume enough water and consume beverages and foods that consists of enough water to replenish the body
•	The experts of the Institute of Medicine recommended  daily water intake for men is 3 liters and for the women is 2.2 liters

Key Features: 
•	Simple and user-friendly interface
•	Our water tracker remind you when and how much water you have to consume throughout the day
•	The hydration app allows customizing cup and standard (oz) or metric (ml) units
•	You can set wake up & sleep time to drink water for each day
•	Our efficient water reminder provided the backup and restored your drinking data through the water tracker
•	It shows the graph and logs of your daily, weekly, and monthly schedule
•	Our reminder feature allows you to set the time interval of notifications, enable/disable notifications, reminder sound, vibration, LED
•	You can able to update your gender and weight to determine the water goal 

The experts of Eclixtech design this water tracker considering the importance of hydration. So, you ought to utilize our simple hydration app to adopt a better lifestyle for living healthy.

title: Waterly - Water Drink Reminder, Hydration Tracker
description:
Get the free water drinking app now for weight loss, great skin, health & hydration.

Drinking the right amount of water is very important to keep your skin healthy and boost the weight loss process. But do you actually drink enough water every day?

Waterly is a new-generation hydration tracker app, which helps you maintain water balance easily. The water app will specify your optimal daily amount of water and reminds you to drink water every day. It helps you develop a healthy habit of drinking water daily and keep your body in healthy condition! Drinking enough water helps to reduce anxiety and stress levels, normalize your pressure, heart work, improve brain and physical activity.
✅ Easy to use
Input your weight, height and activity details to start, and Waterly will suggest your daily goal. You will receive notifications from the hydration app to remind you to drink water - and you can log drinks from notification directly. 
✅ Variety of drinks & personal stats
Log water, tea, coffee, and more drinks to track your hydration level everyday, enjoy your healthier body and brain. Check personalized stats to track your progress, analyze drinks consumption. Track your weight changes as well to see how water consumption influences your body and skin condition. 
✅ Benefits to your health
People who had just 2 or 3 more cups of water a day then usual seem to have less fat, sugar, salt, and overall calories through the day. That means proper hydration could help you lose weight. Use an in-built weight tracker to see your progress and results from this simple action - adding an extra glass of water per day. 
Start using the Water Drink Reminder today and see how you reach your hydration and weight goals! 🐬

Key Features:

💧 Notifications
💧 Water counter
💧 Unit selection: standard (fl oz) or metric (ml) units.
💧 Many drinks: tea, coffee, vegan drinks, alcohol and soft drinks.
💧 Weight tracker: tracks how your water intake helps to lose weight.
💧 Capacity customization: set amount to drink at a time.
💧 Statistics: view graphs of your daily, weekly, and monthly water intake.
💧 Schedule notifications: choose when to receive the drink water notifications.
💧 Customize notifications: set sounds, preferred view, add a widget to your home screen.
💧 Sleep time: set your sleep time to receive notifications only when you are awake.

🗒 Share with us your Waterly story: how drinking enough water has changed your lifestyle or helped to feel better? 
Or write to us with feedback or suggestions - we will be happy to improve our app and make your life healthier and more fun. 

💥 New drinks release every week! Write to us about what you drink usually and we will add your favorite drinks shortly!

title: Waterly - Water Drink Reminder, Hydration Tracker
description:
Get the free water drinking app now for weight loss, great skin, health & hydration.

Drinking the right amount of water is very important to keep your skin healthy and boost the weight loss process. But do you actually drink enough water every day?

Waterly is a new-generation hydration tracker app, which helps you maintain water balance easily. The water app will specify your optimal daily amount of water and reminds you to drink water every day. It helps you develop a healthy habit of drinking water daily and keep your body in healthy condition! Drinking enough water helps to reduce anxiety and stress levels, normalize your pressure, heart work, improve brain and physical activity.
✅ Easy to use
Input your weight, height and activity details to start, and Waterly will suggest your daily goal. You will receive notifications from the hydration app to remind you to drink water - and you can log drinks from notification directly. 
✅ Variety of drinks & personal stats
Log water, tea, coffee, and more drinks to track your hydration level everyday, enjoy your healthier body and brain. Check personalized stats to track your progress, analyze drinks consumption. Track your weight changes as well to see how water consumption influences your body and skin condition. 
✅ Benefits to your health
People who had just 2 or 3 more cups of water a day then usual seem to have less fat, sugar, salt, and overall calories through the day. That means proper hydration could help you lose weight. Use an in-built weight tracker to see your progress and results from this simple action - adding an extra glass of water per day. 
Start using the Water Drink Reminder today and see how you reach your hydration and weight goals! 🐬

Key Features:

💧 Notifications
💧 Water counter
💧 Unit selection: standard (fl oz) or metric (ml) units.
💧 Many drinks: tea, coffee, vegan drinks, alcohol and soft drinks.
💧 Weight tracker: tracks how your water intake helps to lose weight.
💧 Capacity customization: set amount to drink at a time.
💧 Statistics: view graphs of your daily, weekly, and monthly water intake.
💧 Schedule notifications: choose when to receive the drink water notifications.
💧 Customize notifications: set sounds, preferred view, add a widget to your home screen.
💧 Sleep time: set your sleep time to receive notifications only when you are awake.

🗒 Share with us your Waterly story: how drinking enough water has changed your lifestyle or helped to feel better? 
Or write to us with feedback or suggestions - we will be happy to improve our app and make your life healthier and more fun. 

💥 New drinks release every week! Write to us about what you drink usually and we will add your favorite drinks shortly!

title: HidrateSpark Water Bottle
description:
*This app is way cooler when paired with your HidrateSpark smart water bottle*
Why keep track of your water intake manually when your water bottle can do it for you?

We all know drinking water is important but millions of us don’t get enough to drink each day, because it’s so easy to forget and hard to track, especially in our busy lives. Hidrate Spark is here to change that and make dehydration a thing of the past.

HIDRATESPARK SMART WATER BOTTLE GLOWS
HidrateSpark is a smart water bottle that automatically tracks how much water you drink and syncs with this app via bluetooth. This bottle will even glow from within when you need to drink more water.

HYDRATION HISTORY
See your hydration progress over time in a daily, weekly, and monthly view. How many days in a row can you reach your goal?

CUSTOMIZED DAILY GOAL
The app calculates a recommended hydration goal based on your personal parameters such as age, height, weight and gender. It can even use your location to determine the temperature, humidity and elevation of your surroundings to make sure your goal is customized specifically to you. You can also manually set your goal for health reasons if you’d like.

INTEGRATE WITH FITNESS AND HEALTH TRACKERS
Sync with popular fitness trackers and apps to further customize your goal based on your activity level. Whether you run, bike, swim, lift, do yoga, workout, or simply walk your activity level affects how much water you need to drink.

NEVER LOSE YOUR BOTTLE
Losing your water bottle sucks, that’s why we made it really hard for this to happen. When location services are turned on the app will know the last place it was paired with your smart water bottle and show you on a map, so you can go back and get it.

KEEP AN EYE ON YOUR FRIENDS
Keep an eye on your friends progress to make sure they are staying hydrated. Start some friendly competition to see who can get the best streak by meeting their goal the most days in a row.

FUN NOTIFICATIONS
The app will also send helpful reminders and notifications when you begin to fall off track and need to drink more water. The bottle will also light up and glow as a fun way to remind you to stay hydrated. Can your friends’ water bottle do that?

*Drinking water is essential to your bodies health and well being. Check out some of the areas of your life that are affected by hydration.

COGNITION & MOOD: Your brain is comprised of 75% water, so proper hydration can have a positive impact on cognitive function and mood.

ATHLETIC PERFORMANCE: Even 1-2% dehydration can decrease physiological performance and 5 % dehydration can decrease your physical performance by 30%. So if you want to win, you better be hydrated.

HEALTH: Alongside a healthy diet and proper exercise, hydration can help dramatically improve your physical health.

WEIGHT LOSS: Combined with a  healthy diet and exercise drinking water can increase your metabolism and help you avoid eating and drinking extra calories.

INCREASED ENERGY: Drinking plenty of water helps with blood circulation thus decreasing your feeling of tiredness and fatigue.

AVOID HEADACHES: Staying properly hydrated can help avoid headaches.

HEALTHIER SKIN: Staying properly hydrated helps your skin stay hydrated to help it look younger and healthier.

BOOST IMMUNITY: Staying properly hydrated can help you fight off illness and infections.

PREGNANCY: Pregnant and breastfeeding moms need to be properly hydrated so they can support their new baby.

Learn more about HidrateSpark products and services at www.hidratespark.com

developerAddress: 1400 Van Buren St NE, Suite 135, Minneapolis, MN 55413
recentChanges: Fixed an issue where profile images weren't working on newer Android devices
comments: Everything is great, when it works. Seems to struggle to stay connected, I often have to go into airplane mode to reset it for it to update. If I don't do that, then it constantly tells me I'm behind as if I haven't drank any water at all. If this can be fixed to remain connected to my steel bottle 24/7, then it would be 5 stars.

I am disappointed because it is annoying that anytime at all that I move away from the app page (the app page still open on my phone but just say I switch to another page for a few moments, like to do this review or switch over to look at my fitbit app or anything else) then when I return to the hidrate spark app page it is "searching" for bottle. I have to turn Bluetooth off and back on for it to ever connect!! There has to be s better way..

Over all its working. Has several bugs to work out. Background sync doesn't work at all. Had better luck turning it off and making sure to force close the app to get it to connect and sync regularly when you do open the app. Also, the amount of water you need to drink may suddenly sky rocket. I was at a goal of 53 oz until mid day. Then suddenly it decided I should drink 77 oz for the day. I didn't manage to get that done so late in the day.

The concept is great but my bottle stopped connecting to the app. I have contacted customer service several times and they have been quick to respond and offer lots of suggestions. The first two times after contacting them the bottle worked well for a short period of time. This last time nothing worked. I highly disappointed.
Great App, But Not Solid This application does not stay linked to my cup. When it works it works, but when it doesn't, it doesn't.

title: Kropla - Drink Water Tracker and Reminder
descriptionHTML:
Drinking water is really essential to your health. But even if we try to drink enough water, we often miss to do that or forget how much we drink.

This water reminder is simple and easy to use, it reminds you to drink water through your day and assists to track your liquid intake.

Enter your weight and the app will recommend you amount of water you should drink daily. Set your start and end time to drink water and choose frequency of reminders. Update water amount every time you’ve drink a glass of water to keep track your hydration.

Features:
• Scheduled Day/Night mode
• Track the daily water intake;
• See how well you perform with pacer
• Choose between different skins of tracker
• Add glasses to favorites, set hydration factor, choose color;
• Set the daily goal manually or it will be calculated automatically based on your weight;
• Apply adjustments to your goal (weather, sport, pregnancy/breastfeeding, etc.)
• Turn on the reminders, make them silent or turn completely off:
•• Set the time when you wake up and go to sleep;
•• Set reminders frequency;
•• Set reminders to refill your favorite glass
•• Create your custom reminders schedule
• Pick the unit: imperial (fl oz, lb) or metric (ml, kg);
• See your stats
• See the history of water intake.

comments: This is the best water app I've found (after downloading and testing so many). It's simple, intuitive, customizable, and, dare I say, not tacky or childish. One of my favorite things is that you can set when and how often you get reminded, if at all. I've been using it for a week and have hit my goal every single day.
Its the best water tracking app i can find! My only issue is i cant name my drinks, and i will probably forget what drinks what.

It is checked but it's your input that you already have the time by 8:00am,8:23am, 8:58 and so forth, I have to have a reminder every hour on the hour. I'm using you'd because it will remind me to refill my water bottle in which I have two 50 oz bottles I have to refill but I refill them both just once everyday. Please fix this problem and respond to this message on your app review please 🙏!

Exactly what I'm looking for, I've looked through over 20 water reminder apps and this one was the best one for me! It allows me to set my own reminders, edit the amount I want to drink daily, and edit the drink container sizes! I also like that I can change the background 😊 The only even sort of complaint that I have is that I wish the icon for it was different, like a water drop or something.

Nice design and easy to use. Has some customisable options, including a dark mode. An extra reminder option, 'No reminder when you're ahead' would be good. So that when we're on track and ahead of the water intake the reminders don't keep showing up. Edit: App quickly incorporated this feature! Thanks Oleg.

title: Water Drinking Reminder - Water Tracker
description:
Do you drink enough water every day?
Do you always forget to drink water?

This Water Drinking Reminder is definitely what you need! 100% FREE!

Water Drinking Reminder - Water Tracker smartly reminds you to drink water every day. It helps you stay hydrated, and develop good habits of water drinking with a healthier body.

You only need to fill in information of your gender, weight, input your local weather and exercise frequency, then Water Drinking Reminder will calculate how much water you need to drink every day.

This drink water reminder app not only reminds you when it's time to replenish water, but also track your daily water intake. You can also reach your daily goal to get motivated achievements.

# Benefits of Drinking Water #
- Keep fit and lose weight
- Give you healthy skin
- Help muscle growth and recovery
- Help your body detoxify
- Promote digestion

Smart Reminder
- No disturbance. Won’t get reminders when you nap and sleep
- Customize your reminders, continue or stop receiving reminders after reaching your daily goal

Different Reminder Types
- Timed reminder: remind you at the set time
- Interval reminder: remind you according to the time interval you set

Intuitive Graph
- Record your daily water drinking
- Analyze your water drinking over day, week, month, and year
- Track your drinking water history

Daily Water Tracker
- Simple and intuitive interface, easy to use
- Diverse drinking menu, about 20 drinks to choose from
- Customize your daily goal
- Change the cup look and capacity
- Get motivated by unlocking achievement badges
- Calculate how much water you need to replenish every day based on your weight and gender
- Sync your health data with Google fit
- Backup and restore data by signing in with your Google account or Facebook account

In order to replenish water in time, a smart reminder is very necessary and helpful to our life. Download this wonderful Water Tracker for free now and share it with your family and friends! Let them join you and develop good drinking habits! We welcome your valuable feedback, your suggestions and requests are our sources of progress!

title: Gulp - Hydrate & track water
description:
Gulp is the BEST way to calculate a daily water consumption goal and track water consumption.


Helping yourself create good habits should be easy and simple!  With Gulp's straightforward user interface and rich settings, tracking water consumption and staying hydrated could never be easier.


Features:

* Daily water consumption goal calculation.
* Pace ring to indicate where your water tracking should be at any given time of the day.
* Very easy water tracking.
* Reminders to keep water tracking throughout the day.
* Google Fit integration for a real-time water consumption goal.


First, Gulp will calculate a daily water consumption goal tailored for your body.  Next, Gulp will help you track water consumption.  To help keep pace, Gulp indicates where your daily water consumption should be at any time during the day by displaying a green ring adjacent to your water consumption.


Tracking water consumption with Gulp is easy!  Gulp allows you to choose from several common container sizes, displaying their volume and a small, relevant image.  Volumes can be displayed in metric, US, or imperial units.  You can also add/remove custom container sizes to help your tracking be more accurate.


Gulp can provide reminders to drink water and track water consumption at intervals you specify, helping push you to create habits and stay hydrated!


Google Fit integration is now live!  With Google Fit integration enabled, Gulp is capable of producing a REAL-TIME water consumption goal!  Gulp will periodically query your Google Fit datastore for your current weight and the amount of exercise you have done today.  Your daily water consumption goal will update based on your current weight and the precise amount of exercise you have done the current day.


Of course, if you do not use Google Fit, you can manually specify your amount of daily activity and Gulp will pad your daily water consumption goal with a fixed amount of extra water!


Coming soon:
- Home screen widget
- Multi-language support
- Achievements with Google Play Games Service
- View your consumption progress and historical data with graphs


Please email me at andrew.dahm@gmail.com if you encounter any bugs or wish to request a feature be added to the application.  Please remember Gulp is intended to be fast and lightweight.  I would like to keep the user interface as straightforward as possible because tracking your water intake should be quick and easy.


The logo for Gulp was created using the Android Asset Studio under the Creative Commons license.
https://romannurik.github.io/AndroidAssetStudio/icons-launcher.html

recentChanges: This small update adds a confirmation message when deleting water to help prevent unwanted deletion.  I am still working on history functionality.
comments: Excellent app that works as advertised. Note that you can't track your history in it but I didn't really need that. A suggestion to developer: to allow reminders to be set to trigger every 3h in the given interval. If possible it would be nice if they could be set every 2.5h too.

Lightweight, unobtrusive, handy. If you want an easy way to have regular reminders to drink water and a way to log your daily intake- here it is. The app doesn't have some of the more complex features of others e.g no weekly graph. Whilst the addition of plotting water intake over time would be excellent, I don't expect perfection from a free and non-monetized app. The dev has done a great job in making something light that does the job just fine.

This app is simple, easy to use and understand. All I was looking for was a way to keep track of my daily intake of water as i never get thirsty and forget to drink. love that it allows you to add in different volumes as sometimes you can be drinking from a glass or bottle that is not a standard size. am loving this app and will continue to use it.

I went through about 4 other apps before deciding on this one. I like the simplicity of it and the ability to change the amount you drink per entry. I don't always drink water from a water bottle so thats nice. I do however wish the was a history so that i could see my previous days intake and to also be able to amend a previous day if you forgot to add your last bottle or glass.

I love how simple this is. I DEFINITELY appreciate that the whole version of this is ad-free. It's effortless and intuitive to use... The fact that it syncs with Google Fit is just icing on the cake. I wish the reminder notification sound was customizable instead of my standard device notification, but it's really not that big of a deal compared to issues I've had with other water tracking apps.

title: Nox WaterTime 💧 Remind Drink Water, Daily Tracker
description:
Stay Fit and Be Healthy with Water Time Reminder

Use the Nox WaterTime app to plan your drinking schedule, and track a histogram of daily, weekly or monthly consumption. You will get the suggestion, set custom goals and track ongoing averages. Drinking the right amount of water is very important to keep your skin healthy and beautiful, boost weight loss. 

💧 Track water and keep body hydrated
You can easily create a profile to maintain health records and analyze your records with Nox Water Time. Simply go to the settings and select the Personal Data section and fill out all the important fields there correctly and done. Tracking your water will so much easier when you have set your data which will be there at the duty all day long to remind you to take your glass of water.

⏰ Set a reminder and have healthy skin
Nox WaterTime app is quite easy to use and creating reminders is so easy that you don’t have to struggle with how much water quantity, which unit and when to set. Simply set your water reminder and you are so good to clear up your skin and make your skin much healthier all day long. 

🍶 Customize daily water needs and speed up Metabolism levels
If you have just begun your daily water drinking schedule. You can use Nox Water Time to customize a beginner to drink 4 or 5 liters of water every day and start as your comfort levels and capacity to speed up your metabolism levels.

📊 View graph & history and promote overall health
There are a chart and graphical representation which shows how much water has your drunk through a period in Nox WaterTime. Check your daily, weekly and monthly water consumption on the Water Time.

🥛 Note water volume and deliver oxygen throughout the body
Blood is more than 90 percent water, and blood carries oxygen to different parts of the body. You can customize the app based on the type and size of drinking cups, and it will note the volume of water you have drunk every day. You should drink enough water daily to deliver oxygen throughout the body and keep all the body functions going pretty well with the reminder of Nox WaterTime.

📉 Support weight records and help in weight loss
In the Nox Water Time app, you can record your daily weight and set the water track. Drinking a good amount of water is an important factor when it comes to losing weight, even more than exercise. You can keep your weight under control with a healthy water plan.

comments: Beautiful app, but some issues. I wish I could delete intake if I accidentally press it. I wish I could customize the goal to whatever I want (80oz instead of 78oz). I also think it would be better if the water graphic rose with the amount you've had. I find the visual motivating. I really want to keep this app but will probably delete.
Please add sync option, so that we can get the data after reinstall and phone reset. And Pop-up Reminder also which is very helpful than notification.
Simple and practicall, but i need the reminder in my mi band 4. Any idea why doesn't arrive? Thank you in advance.
Fantastic, beatiful, and thrilling, This is most interesting remind application I have ever used.
Love this app. The best drinking water tracker after compared few similar apps.

title: Water Manager: Intake Tracker and Reminder
description:
Water Manager ( Previously Known as Water Reminder ) is a full fledged, ad free, open source Water Tracker and Reminder App for Your Daily Water Requirement.   

Water is a very essential component of Human Life. National Academy of Medicine recommends 2.7-3.7 liters of water for an average person daily. But human life is so much full of chores and works that we might just forget.  

Thus introducing Water Manager, A beautiful and simple to use Mobile app with that will make sure you take your required amount of liquids daily.  

- When opened, this app will ask you for some basic user information, to calculate your daily water requirement (Don't worry, This information is completely local and safe).   

- After that it will remind you at regular intervals to drink water.It will automatically snooze these reminders when you are sleeping during the night( based on the sleep times you provide)  

- Simply press the container button to log your water intake. There are many containers (Like 150 ml cup, 250 ml glass, 500 ml bottle,etc) to choose from. You may create your own container if you want.
- It also automatically records your total daily intake( accessible via the leftmost menu). You can check at which day you drank less water than required.


Features: 
- Free, Open Sourced with no ads.  
- Simple and beautiful UI.
- Water intake reminders, add water intake log via notification only, snooze notifications via notification only.  
- Intake Logs for current day.
- Intake Logs for all the previous days.
- Easy to modify details.
- Simple and Secure.

Download Now!

PS : for disclaimer, credits and other important info, visit the opensource version link: https://github.com/root-ansh/WaterManager

You just enter your current weight and Water Drink Reminder will help you calculate the amount of ml of water that needs to be taken to your body every day.

title: Drink Water
descriptionHTML:
The app that helps you drink water properly.
Calculate how much you need to drink each day and receive reminders .

If you do not know how much you need to drink each day , no problem! Our app has a super water calculator to help you. Just enter your weight and Drink Water tells how much you should drink per day.

You do not need to worry about remembering to drink water, just set the time you wake up, the time you go to bed and our app does the rest . It will send you notifications during the day to remind you the right time to drink.

It is time to water your body! Download now this water tracker and check it out .

- Calculate how much water you should drink per day based on your weight ;
- Schedule notifications according to the time you wake up and sleep ;
- Choose the interval between notifications ;
- Track your historical consumption during the month ;
- Simple, beautiful and intuitive.

Download now and see!

Another success of Aplicativos Legais www.aplicativoslegais.com
summary: Receive reminders to drink water properly with this amazing app!
recentChanges: Widget Bug fix
comments: Glitch. The widget always defaults to it's own numbers- 6oz/18oz/20oz. I have uninstalled it many times. It doesn't matter what I input for the ounces. I paid to have premium but, i wouldn't consider just having a widget option as premium.
This is a cool app and it always reminds me when to drink water!

This app makes it very easy to ensure I drink the amount of water I should. I appreciate being able to customise the interval between reminders. The running water sound is an awesome reminder to have a drink of water.
Very well done app. What I most appreciate about this app is it allows you to drink at your discretion with a minimum intrusive reminder.
It really helps. I like the sound it makes

title: Natural Weight Loss in 30 Days
description:
Are you planning for weight loss? If yes here is the simple formula for Weight Loss

More Water + Healthy Diet + Workouts + Yoga + Step Counter + Weight Loss Tips = Weight Loss

Weight Loss App motivate you to loss extra weight with in short time and without side effects,

Main Features

#	Water Reminder (Based on Water Therapy)
#	Healthy Diet Tips
#	Enjoyable Workouts ( Weight loss Exercises)
#	Rate Yourself.
#     Yoga Poses
#      Simple and effective exercises for Weight Loss
#      Step Counter
#      Surya Namaskar Poses
#      Breathing Exercises 
#      Motivation



What natural water therapy suggest?

Divide the water intake in two parts.
1. Early Morning Water 
2. Daytime Water

Why early morning water is required?

Drinking water in empty stomach in the morning helps us to purifies the large intestine and it improves the stomach's chances to absorb nutrients properly. A better digestive system automatically takes care of a lot of other things.

• It is good to drink 1.0 - 1.5 liters of water.
• In between wake up time and breakfast.

How much water is required in a daytime?

The amount of water you need depends on a variety of factors, including the climate you live in, how physically active you are, and whether you're experiencing an illness or have any other health problems.

• It is good to drink 2.5 - 3.0 liters of water in a day.


The benefits of drinking water :

* Helps prevent kidney stones
* Clears up your skin
* Stay in shape and keep fit.
* Keeps your skin and nails healthy
* Keeps you hydrated

Key Features of App :

* Simple and easy.
* Water Drink alarm on time to remind you to drink water.
* Water tracker that will remind you when and how much water to drink throughout the 
   day.
* Customized cup and standard (ml) or (oz) units
* You can set your start and end time to drink water for each day
* Track water Intake in the early morning and throughout the day separately.
* Check your Water Intake history.
* Health Tips and benefits of water .
* Rate your day.
* Simple workouts to loss extra weight.
* How to eat and when to eat.
* Do workouts with simple animations
* It counts your steps when you walk with better battery life.
* Yoga poses which are simple and effective.
* Different types of Breathing exercises which keeps you calm and relaxed.



# 7 min workouts 

* Abdominal Crunch
* High Kness
* Tuck Jump
* Jumping Jacks
* Push Ups
* Squats
* Super Man
* V - Up
* Cobra Stretch
* Sit Up
* Pulse Ups
* Leg Raise
* Wipers


# Yoga Poses 

* Utthita Trikosana
* Virabhadrasana 2
* Adho Mukha Shvanasana
* Vrikshasana
* Virabhadrasana 3
* Uttanasana
* Garudasana
* Balasana
* Marjariasana
* Setu bandha Sarvangasana
* Viparita Karani
* Uttana Shishosana


# Breathing Exercises

* Breathe (5-0-5)
* Breathe (5-1-8)
* Breathe (4-7-8)

recentChanges: # Minor bugs rectified
comments: I regret not coming across this app before! This is hands down the most practical, realistic and awesome app to keep track of your water consumption, food you eat, steps you take, how much you exercise and what not! Strongly recommend!

This is a great app for recording your healthy habits. I love it. It would be nice to have the information backed up on Google drive so that information can be easily uploaded to a new phone when you have to change it. Great app!
I like the app in terms of simplicity and color themes. However, may I ask how to input details in the monthly goals section? It seems that's in there but cannot write anything on it. Thanks!
Good work. Little scope for improving user interface.
The app is light and simple to use. It feels motivating, and have a feel-good interface. I'm hooked to it, from the first minute, I used it.

title: Liquid - Drink Tracker
description:
Liquid makes keeping track of your daily drink consumption a breeze by offering a sleek intuitive user interface. Create an unlimited amount of drink types in order to track any drink you consume throughout the day. 

Features include: 
*Customizable Drink Types, complete with configurable colors, sugar, calorie and caffeine values
*Customizable Daily Goals, to help you work every day towards improving your health. 
*Easy to use dynamic dashboard; featuring 1-click drinks, along with interactive progress bars for daily goals, and daily sugar, calorie and caffeine intake.
*Modify the sugar, calorie and caffeine intake values and daily goals at any time to suit your ever-changing lifestyle.
*Drinks Menu: Displays a historical view of your drinks, along with a data summary for each day, and offers options to add a drink for a given day and also to display drinks by month or year.

Tell us what you think via a review or shoot us an e-mail! We're just getting started here at HellWeb Studios and would love your feedback! Future updates to enhance the overall user experience are in the works.

not really what i was looking for as i am on a fluid restriction.

FAAIIILLL !!! who drinks orange juice these days , so I deleted it and added a personal custom drink type to the dashboard , Coffee (DUH!) and it CRASHES. every SINGLE time I click on my coffee off the dashboard it crashes.  This app did nothing for me other than motivate me to become a software tester  , Lol. DELETED !!!!

Water Drink Reminder is a tracker & reminder designed to remind you to drink water during the day. Our app will help you to stay hydrated and drink the amount of water you need every day!

Just enter your current weight, and Water Drink Reminder will help you determine how much water your body needs every day. Our app also help you normalize your water balance, and improve your health and shapes. 

Key Features:
- Water tracker that will remind you when to drink throughout the day
- Charts and logs of your daily intake
- Customizable cups
- Set your start and end time to drink water for each day

Stay Hydrated with Water Drink Reminder!!

title: Water drink reminder - Water reminder & tracker
description:
Water Drink Reminder helps you to drink water if you always forget it. The best healthcare application for you and it's totally free.
Proper hydration keeps your skin healthy and helps you lose weight.
Water Reminder is not only water drinking reminder but also a water tracker app that can help you develop a good habit to drinkwater on time daily and ensure daily regular and enough water intake!

This daily hydration reminder is the app which helps us to track the quantity of water we drink and remind us to drink water in right time, use water drinking reminder app to save the body in short supply and drink water after workout, meditation or yoga.

We all know that water is essential to our health, get Drink Water Reminder and water tracker, start to drink water and record your water intake!

People are always too busy to drink water, or we only drink water when we feel thirsty, that’s too late if so, water plays a very important role in our body, it transports nutrients and oxygen into cells, regulates body temperature, helps with metabolism and so on, drinking enough water can help us lose weight, look younger with healthier skin, less likely to get sick, helps in digestion and constipation, relieves fatigue, have a good mood, reduce the risk of cancer and more.

To majority of us, we don’t know exactly how much water we drink, is that quantity suitable for us? this daily water app helps us to track the quantity of water we drink and remind us to drink water in right time.

Water reminder is very easy to use, just select your gender and enter your current weight, and Water Drink Reminder will help you determine how much water your body needs every day, You can also tracker water history, reach your daily goal to open the respective achievements, and many other useful functions
Remember to update the app each time you drink a cup of water. Then the app will remind you when it's time for another drink. Hydration helper not only tracks what you drink, but also reminds you when it's time for another drink.


* Key Features include:

💧 Easy to use, beautiful interface.
💧 Schedule to receive drink water reminder or select the time
💧 Tracker water history
💧 track your drinking progress by week, month and year
💧 Based on gender, weight will let you know how much water should drink a day.
💧 Diverse menu of nearly 20 different drinks.
💧 Can adjust the amount of drinking water in the past.
💧 Smart reminder: time mode go to bed so you don't get drink water reminder.

* The benefits of drinking water:

Keeps your skin and nails healthy
Helps prevent kidney stones
Regulates body temperature
Prevents Hangovers
Helps maintain blood pressure

Let water drinking reminder help you create that healthy habit with all the great features, if you want to keep healthy, drink enough. Want to drink enough, install water drinking reminder ! If you feel this water drinking reminder application is useful, share it with your friends and family.

Download Drink water reminder right now!

comments: Great for keeping track of your water intake. No faff, easy to use. One thing; I wish the cup size was more customisable (I drink from a 400ml cup) and the interval could be set to more than an hour. But, all in all, it's a great app to track your drinking progress. Five stars! :)

I actually rather liked it initially, the reminders & visual aid are quite nice, but now everytime I log my water a loud obnoxious ad starts to play. For the first week I used it the only ads were in a banner at the bottom on the log screen which was fine, but now a full screen ad pops up. It's annoying and I don't think the app is worth keeping with the addition of this nuisance - my option is to delete the app or keep my phones media volume on silent all day. 😑

Breastfeeding friendly/compatible!!!!!!! :) Downloaded like 6 water reminder apps (not to track intake, but to calculate and remind) & This app is the only one that even mentioned let alone had breastfeeding as a special option!! And is now the only water reminder app left installed on my phone! Plus I am making more milk from being properly hydrated! Momma approved for sure ♡♡♡♡♡ 5 stars

Awesome app!!! This app encourages me to keep fit and drink my water, this app is very essential... I would highly recommend this app to anyone... looking for a water drink reminder app? Well congratulations because this is the one for you... Try it out guys!!!

Very happy with the app. It's a simple way to keep track of one's water intake. As this is something that is often overlooked due to my work and personal circumstances. I believe this should work for me for a long time. So far, no issues. :)

title: Drink water tracker & reminder
description:
As you know about 70% of our body is composed of water, drink water proper is very important, proper drink water habits and effectively improve your health, keeps your skin healthy, reduce stress, lose weight, and reduce bodily fatigue and illnesses. Drink water reminder (also called Water reminder) is an app will help you calculate how much you need to drink each day and provides a great support to you develop good habits of water drinking everyday.

Drink water reminder will help you to plan drink water schedule daily in detail, track your hydration and gently remind you to drink water daily to to accomplish your goal for a healthier body.
	
Features:
- Beautiful interface, intuitive & easy to use.
- Auto suggest the amount of water to drink each day base on age, gender, weight.
- Keep track of you daily water intake using smart remind drink water will help you drink water timely.
- Smart reminder will help you drink water timely.
- Reports and statistics - will show a report of water consumption for the day.
- A lot of tips to help you drink water proper and encourage you to accomplish your goals.
- Graphical chart of your drinking water diary by week,month, year.
- Drink water report (drink frequency, average completion).
- Plan drinking water reminder schedule, app will remind you when it’s time.
- Easy to set your glass and bottle size.
- Customized cup and standard (oz) or metric (ml) units.
- Drink water reminder is 100% FREE! app. 

How to use:
Step 1: Download drink water reminder from CHPlay
Step 2: Select your gender (Male or Female).
Step 3: Select your current weight.

Step 5: Your sleeping time daily.

Step 7: Just let the app know when you get a drink by pressing Add a Cup icon on main screen.

Drink water reminder will send you notifications during the day to remind you the right time to drink.
Download drink water reminder app now to improve your health and prevent certain illnesses. Thanks you for using our apps if you have any questions, please contact us.

title: Water Drink Reminder - Hydro
description:
The Hydro application is a simple water drink reminder, to motivate you to regularly drink the correct amount.

If you do not drink the correct amount of water, this is the perfect application, which will restore your healthy habits and will help you care for proper hydration.
After installing, the application calculator will calculate and suggest the water demand of your body, which will become your daily goal to achieve. 
Reminders that you can adjust to your needs will ensure that you will never again forget about regularly drinking water and additionally monitor and compare your results on charts and statistics.

Due to its functionalities as well as the possibility of full personalization,  Hydro is the most advanced application of this type on the market. Try it yourself!

App features include:
★ Water demand calculator – will calculate and suggest the amount of water to drink each day 
★ Reminders – will ensure regular hydration
★ Charts and statistics - will show your progress as you regularly drink water
★ Adjustable sizes of containers - adjust them to your needs
★ Multilanguage （Deutsch, English, Español, Français, Italiano, Русский, Polski, Português, 中文, 日本語）
★ automatic backup copies in a cloud
★ data transfer between various devices
★ access to analyses and charts from web browser (http://hydro-app.com)

Regular consumption of fluids may increase your efficiency and vitality, and affect your health and condition.  

The demand for fluids depends on the individual dispositions of each person, so the calculations of the Hydro  application calculator should be treated solely as auxiliary guidelines.

comments: I like the notifications, but the ads have gotten out of control. I used to be able to dismiss the ad immediately but now there is a 5 second delay. Was good earlier, but ads became very frequent and irritating

This app is very helpful for me. I don't always think about drinking water so the alarms are very helpful. Make sure to set an alarm sound you can hear. Controls are easy. I say good job. Not very many ads either. It was free so i knew there would be some. I was pleasantly surprised that there hasn't been very many at all.

This is an awesome app to track my water and I love it! The water bubble is awesome and it's definitely been motivating me. Why only 4 stars? The silly ads. Ugh!!! If I find another water app that I like without all the ads, I will definitely switch.

title: Water Assistant - Daily Reminders
description:
We all know how water is essential to our health. Drinking enough water each day is crucial for many reasons: to regulate body temperature, keep joints lubricated, prevent infections, deliver nutrients to cells, and keep organs functioning properly. Being well-hydrated also improves sleep quality, cognition, and mood. A healthy person needs 30 to 50 ounces of fluid per day.

To most of us, we are always too busy to drink water, or we only drink water when we feel thirsty, that’s too late if so, thirst is signal which our body warn us that our body have lost water balance, and the cells have already dehydrated to serious situation. That is where you need to install Water Assistant- Daily Reminders application. It will help us to track the quantity of water we drink and remind us to drink water in right time.

Features
-	Automatically calculate your water goal based on the information you provided, or you can manually set your goal amount of daily drinking water.
-	Touch to log each drinking
-	Graphical representation of how much of water you drunk.
-	Check glasses of water drunk, and you have ability to edit it.
-	Customize volume of each glass of water.
-	Plan drinking schedule and it will remind you when it is time
-	Histogram to show your daily water intake and Pie chart to show the different type of drinks you drunk.
-	Water tracker by week and month in the chart
-	Support oz and ml
-	Have different types of drinks to choose.

Water plays a very important role in our body, it transports nutrients and oxygen into cells, regulates body temperature, helps with metabolism and so on, drinking enough water can help us lose weight, look younger with healthier skin, less likely to get sick, helps in digestion and constipation, relieves fatigue, have a good mood, reduce the risk of cancer and more. We are here to help you, please install the application and track your daily water intake and get remainders in right time.

If you have any question or suggestion, please send email to our support waterassistant@compilework.com.

However, the beverage options are limited and very specific: apple juice but no other juices, white wine but not red, coffee but not tea, ginger ale but not Coke, etc. Worst was the omission of tea, one of the most common drinks in the world. title: Water Drink Reminder
description:
Our bodies are more than 50% water. 
Water is essential to our lives.

But we often do not drink the necessary amount of water.
This free app can help you to change it.

The Drink water reminder application will help you keep your drinking regime.


Calculate how much you need to drink water during the day based on your gender, weight, physical activity, ambient temperatures and dehydrating drinks that you have drunk.

Application widget on main screen of your mobile phone.
