title: Water Alert
description:
Water is essential to our life, drinking enough and right quantity of water is vital to our health. But because of our bad memory, busy work or too many little things, the day is ended before we drink enough water. 

Water Alert is the sweet app to remind to drinking water, this app is a must have to make yourself hydrate, especially for breast feeding mom or people has health problem. It helps and motivates you to drink water according to the schedule and will keep the water drinking logs, including the quantity and time you drink water. 

Key Features: 
⁃ Set daily water drinking goals. 
⁃ Custom water drinking schedule. (Create unlimited reminders.) 
⁃ 12 free reminding sounds. 
⁃ Custom reminding test. 
⁃ Set default bottle or you can custom yourself. 
⁃ Shows drunk / goal water. 
⁃ Custom quantity of each bottle. 
⁃ Supports oz/ml/L. 
⁃ Badge to show drunk percentage or remaining percentage. 
⁃ Keeps daily water drinking logs. 
⁃ Shows quantity of each day by logs and histogram. 
⁃ Shows time and quantity of each drinking of a day. 
⁃ Send Logs by email. 
⁃ Supports Dropbox backup and restore. 

If you have any question, please email to thelinklinks@gmail.com.

title: AlcoDroid Alcohol Tracker
description:
AlcoDroid is an alcohol consumption tracker, drinks diary and blood alcohol content calculator. AlcoDroid helps you get a better handle of what you drink and change your drinking habits. Optionally it also tracks costs of your drinks.

AlcoDroid also provides an estimate of your blood alcohol content (BAC) based on the drinks you've logged, plots your BAC development in a chart and indicates when you get below the legal limit or back to sobriety.

Widgets are available to display your current BAC on the home screen.

Named a Top Alcoholism App of 2015 in Healthline: http://www.healthline.com/health/addiction/top-alcoholism-iphone-android-apps

AlcoDroid also allows you to:
- show, edit and export your drink logbook
- chart your drinking habits daily, weekly or monthly
- display and export daily, weekly and monthly alcohol consumption statistics
- set your drinking goal (e.g. 21 standard drinks per week, SD/w) and see how your drinking matches the goal
- setup your own list of "drink presets" to log your drinks fast
- pin the most frequently used drinks to the main screen to log your drinks by two clicks
- share your status and BAC chart on Facebook, by e-mail etc

Supports US, imperial and metric units. Alcohol intake can be displayed in standard drinks (US, UK, CA, AU), grams or milliliters per week or day.

For feedback and support, visit AlcoDroid on Facebook.

recentChanges: - Storage permissions issue fixed
comments: Brilliant for tracking alcohol consumption. Really useful graph shows how pissed you are now, and information reminds you how useless you may be at your current level. Looking at that has stopped me having one (or more) last drinks when I see the estimated time to sober. The graphic is so striking it even works when you're not sober! I think I'm talking myself into contributing for the pro version! The history graphs and stats are brilliant. Only prob is no export to CSV

Can't recommend this app enough. Interface is a bit complex at first but after a small amount of time it's easy to navigate, this really helps me manage and time my drinks throughout the week, helps me see how much I'm drinking and to be consistent with measurements instead of free pouring. I'd recommend fully! I also love the live time input you can put in to really spread your drink out.

On the whole, I like this app despite its dated UI. What I find really annoying however is the graph showing weekly consumption. I have four 'dry' days a week and my weekend consumption varies between 14 and 21 units. Last Friday, I consumed just 1.42 units but the graph shows 8 or thereabouts. On Saturday, 5.84 units but the graph for that day shows about 42. On Sunday, 11.4 and the graph is off the scale (over 75). Whatever logic is being applied is not user friendly.

Really great app for making it easy to see how much you're drinking and sticking to a limit. My only complaint if you can call it that is I wish it had a cumulative weekly figure rather than an estimate based on previous consumption.

I have used for many years and find it vey useful. Some have complained of inaccurate BAC but if I correctly set up with weight and absorbtion rate it compares very closely to two different breathalysers that I own. To start your week on a Monday, simply enter one dummy drink on a sunday. It will then start new from the next day. Only issue is that if you put a weekly limit in of 14 units and drink 4 units in one day, it shows 200% of target, however weekly & monthly figures correct over time.

title: Water Reminder - Daily Water Drinking Tracker
descriptionHTML:
The proper balance of water is very important for your health. Did you know that the human body consists of 60% of water? And how much water do you drink every day? Our daily drinking water hydration tracker is a water meter, a simple reminder of water intake, that tracking your drinking water, monitoring your drinking water and calculating your daily water intake to help you be healthy.

Also, a water meter will allow you to keep a diary of water consumption, indicate the time of drinking water, and the amount of water that you drink.

Water Reminder is one of the most popular apps for tracking water usage. A water tracking app helps you track how much water you should drink. Also, with Water Reminder Tracker you can monitor water consumption and achieve your goals. Did you forget to drink water? Don’t worry, our water minder will send you water aqualert!

Drink water app will track daily water intake using a single tap water logging. It prevents dehydration by reminding you when you forget to drink water, so you never get thirsty. Would you like to experience a natural H2O body cleanse and have a healthy skin and healthy nails in a natural way, while getting free kidney stone prevention and diabetes prevention?

The benefits of drinking water:
Why is it important to keep track of how much water you drink?
1. Dehydration harm you! Proper hydration it is a source of good mood well-being;
2. Regular water drinking contributes to weight loss. Also, a little hint for you: It is more beneficial to drink cold water because your body needs to spend more calories to heat water to body temperature;
3. Water speeds up the metabolism;
4. Water relieves stress and fatigue;
5. Regular water hydration helps remove toxins from the body;
6. Water moisturizes the skin and helps to get rid of rashes once and for all;
7. Balanced water intake tracking reduces the risk of kidney stones;

10. Regular water drinking has a positive effect on performance;
11. Daily water intake tracking helps digestion;
12. Stay in shape and keep fit; water is calorie free
13. Water balance maintained is essential for life. Because water is life!

NOTE: Our body water balance tracker is a regular drinking water reminder. Water Reminder Tracker is not a medical app! Consult your doctor if you want to use it for medical purposes.

Do you forget to drink water regularly? Install daily Water Reminder, drink water, lose weight, stay hydrated and be healthy!

comments: Do not download this app. Ever since I downloaded it, the app disappeared from my phone and then I started getting random video ads on stuff like Chrome and Facebook. It's my theory that this app is giving me those ads. The app is using the fact that it looks like it's gone or been deleted to it's advantage. After a while, you'll forget you downloaded it and the app will get to advertise stuff 24/7, and you'll be none the wiser as to why you're getting the ads. Don't download it. It's a scam.

You show what times you normally get up in the AM and go to bed at night, and how much water you want to drink during the day. You get periodic reminders to drink your water. Thats it! It helps me remember so I dont have to drink a ton at night.

Thank you for a creating a fantastic user friendly App!! This App has been a great help for my mother (& the rest of the family), in keeping her up with hydrating. With medications that cause her to dehydrate if she doesnt drink water often & regularly, along with minor memory issues,

I like the fact that the app is really easy to operate and its really simple by amazing in its own way. I think it would be perfect if it improves the reminder part of this because the main goal is to remind people that they are supposed drink something called water to keep their body healthy

It has helped me increase my water intake, which has been very helpful for my pregnancy. I would suggest to make it more easy to turn on sound for notifications. Sometimes, I see the notification but it may have appeared long time ago, and I didnt hear the sound.

Fast Diet & Fitness Tracking: It’s easy to track your workouts and count the calories you burn. Track both strength and cardio with our easy-to-use search function, including sets, reps, and weight/rep. Calculate the caloric intake of any meal with our simple calorie calculator. Great for tracking macros and counting carbs!

Diet Program Agnostic: 1200 calorie diet, low carb or no carb diet, vegan diet, keto diet--it’s all the same to us. We’ll help you reach your goals, no matter the diet you follow.

Hundreds of Exercise Demonstrations: Get fit, tone up and avoid common exercise injuries with our short demos of popular cardio & strength exercises. All demos are performed by licensed trainers, so you can learn the right way, every time.

Food Intake and Diet Calculator: Find most foods with our barcode scanner. Get the right calorie and nutritional information from our food database, & save the foods you eat to your food log. Use our calorie intake calculator & nutrition calculator with a tap. Find the makeup the common nutrients & minerals in your diet: calories, carbs, protein, fat, fiber, cholesterol, & more. 

Healthy Meal Planner: Set your goals and we’ll help you plan out your meals for the week. It’ll make your new lifestyle change easier!

Track Your Weight Daily: Keep track of your progress with our easy to use weight & BMI chart. 

Health, Diet & Fitness Articles: Read articles from SparkPeople’s nutritionists & fitness experts to learn more about your metabolism & how to be healthier & more motivated. It’s like having a team of dietitians, nutritionists, & fitness trainers on your phone!

Total Integration: You can access your fitness & nutrition logs from your computer, tablet or phone.

Connect Apps & Devices: Already use other apps or devices to track your fitness, but need weight loss strategies & diet tracking? Just connect the app or device you use to this app! We offer full integration with FitBit, Jawbone UP, Google Fit, Misfit, Runkeeper, & Garmin devices.

SPARKPEOPLE ISN’T A WEIGHT LOSS PROGRAM, WE’RE A COMMUNITY

The SparkPeople Calorie Counter, Food & Diet Tracker fully syncs with our site. Since 2001, SparkPeople.com has helped millions of people lose weight and stay fit by offering support, education and powerful weight loss & fitness tools. With your account, you can also access:

★ SparkPeople.com's vast library of healthy-living articles, fitness videos, & exercise planning tools.
★ SparkRecipes.com, our healthy recipe site. You’ll find over 600,000 healthy & tasty recipes that help you reach your nutrition goals.
★ The web’s friendliest, most supportive healthy lifestyle community. Get support from other members who have been right where you are; reach your weight loss & fitness goals while having fun!

Our #1 goal is to help you achieve your goals. Please send any questions, concerns, or suggestions to support@sparkpeople.com 

Start living a healthier life. Thanks for using our app!

comments: Dont believe these low ratings. I think they're from a competitor who charges a lot, uses chatbots, & doesn't even offer a free version like Spark People does! I haven't seen a lot of ads. If you don't want ads, change your settings or permissions.There is no prob with password reset. If you do have a prob with it, log in via the app first. If you're using the website, log in there with same password. Then sync if you'd like: option is in both the app & the website. It all works fine.

I love how many options they have on this app! I've been using this for years on and off and it never disappoints. From, logging calories, to exercising, to interacting to the users, it's great. My only issue is the amount of advertisements on the app it can be veri inconvenient...

Ads are pretty pervasive. There is usually an ad after every action. If I enter breakfast with 3 items, my action is delayed after each item. I would go to the premium but the option to purchase once yearly is not offered and must be debited monthly. (Not something I can do.) Thank you. I will try that. I did as suggested but the app will not let me enter foods, etc. It will not accept my goals entry. For two days I've gotten a msg asking me to connect. However, my phone is connected to the net

Extremely inaccurate info, nothing I've scanned has had the correct information when compared to the labels. I don't have time to search through the hundreds of incorrect entries from members to find the one that's accurate. You also can't do anything on the app without being forced to watch ads. I won't be continuing with this app.

This is a great way to track calories in and calories out. They have awesome tips tricks articles and ideas on healthy living. They also have exercise videos and amazing coaches to help with healthy life changes.

title: Drink Water Reminder
description:
Daily Water In-take App – Alarm and Reminder to Drink Conveniently

Daily Water In-take – Alarm and Reminder app always takes care that you have adequate supply of water to your body timely. Proper water intake saves your body in shortage of water supply during and after jogging, workout, yoga and daily routine works. Even if you are busy in your office. It improves immunity, helps us to release stress and get rid of fatigue after work. Daily Water in-take App is the best solution to remain hydrated. 

1.	Do you want Glowing Skin?
2.	Do you want healthy digestion body?
3.	Do you want assistance in weight loss?
4.	Do you want to reduces sleepiness and relieves aches?
5.	Do you want to improve your mood?

It is essential to take an adequate amount of water on daily basis.

 If you have been trying to routinize the daily in-take of water but have trouble to doing so because of busy schedule, then you don’t worry because team advert blaster has come up with a special drink water reminder and tracker which reminds you to drink water timely. 
Drink water reminder is a drinking water alarm clock reminds you to drink water which detoxifies your body and gives you glowing skin by which you look ever fresh throughout your hectic routine.

Daily water intake - keep track of your water intake daily. You can rewrite water intake records by customizing the types of bottles or glass you have for drinking water. 
This water alarm is designed to ensure that you meet your water goals, every day.
Daily Water tracker is a fairly simple app which lets you schedule reminders and provides a statistical analysis of your water consumption over a set period of time and keeps you informed about your daily, weekly and monthly target with a cool graphical representation.
You can just input your details as weight, daily need of water intake and simply click a size of containers you use for drinking water and save it with the exact quantity of water it can hold. This app will setup a daily water intake target for you. 


Features:
	Daily Drink water Reminder
	Records your Daily Water Intake
	Customize Water Bottle/Glass
	No water alarm during your sleep time
	Track the total water consumed at a particular time of the day.
	Track the daily water intake and show you in a graphical representation.
	Set drinking water alarm clock manually and automatically to drink water.

title: Easy Urination Diary～Frequent Urination～
description:
By registering urination volume and water intake, you can check the number of urination, urination volume and water intake per day.

【Main function】
★ Urination Registration
Urination time, urination volume, memorandum can be registered.
If you write the strength of urinary urgency, urination pain etc in the memos, it will be helpful at the time of consultation at the hospital.

★ Water Intake Registration
You can register the moisture ingestion date, moisture intake, memo.
If you write down the type of drink etc. in the memo, it will be a reference when you consult at the hospital.
※ Because there are drinks with diuretic action.

★Last 3 days data
You can display the data of the last 3 days.

★ Urination Registration
You can check the urination frequency, urination volume, water intake amount, registered data list at the specified date and time.
If you register by mistake, you can delete it by selecting the data you want to delete from the registration data list.

★ All data deleted
You can delete all registered data by selecting Delete all data of setting.
* Once deleted data can not be restored, please be careful.

★Privacy Poricy

title: Water Tracker Reminder
description:
Drink more water to stay healthy. Our water tracker app gets you drinking more water every day. You can even track your daily water over the last week and compare and share your 'hydration score' with your friends!

You can also keep track of your water fasting efforts and be thirsty less often.

Being well hydrated helps with better skin and losing weight by simply drinking more water. It's so important to get your daily requirement of water per day and our water tracker can help you with that!

Not sure where to start? It's simple, just use our formula to calculate your ideal water intake, then set up our smart water reminders to alert you at the right time to drink more water.

Water tracking and water reminders will help you create a healthy habit in no time at all.

Track your water intake daily and get really useful insights and statistics to track your hydration.

Best of all, this app is completely free! We are always doing our best to improve your experience and would love to hear your feedback by rating our app once you've used it.

Here's a recap of what our app can do for you: Daily water intake tracking, Water statistics, Smart water reminder and Water alarms

title: Water Control: drink water reminder
descriptionHTML:
If you wanted to normalize your water balance, save yourself from dehydration, know that without water there is no health and optimal weight, or you are losing weight or just monitor your well-being, then our app will become your assistant in maintaining hydro balance!
Why do you need the hydration app
“Water control” is “my daily assistant” that will remind you to drink water, and will also track the amount of water you drink per day. You need a tracker if you are losing weight, want to normalize your general condition, well-being, improve health, if you are on a diet or proper nutrition. It is also good for kids and for pregnancy. After all, our tracker will help you comply with the correct drinking regime.
Moreover, together with our app you can establish metabolism, accelerate it, loss weight with water, and protect yourself from dehydration thanks to hydration reminder and from all the unpleasant consequences associated with it. Help the body, prevent kidney stones, and maintain normal blood sugar levels.
Features of the app
Our app for phones and tablets will help you choose the best drinking regime, helps with the establishment of metabolism and detoxification. It will not only remind you that you need to drink water, but also counts in detector the clean water (after all, not all liquid is considered by our body to be pure water) and the necessary amount to the goal. For example, you drank 3 colas of 250 ml each - the application will show you that it is 690 ml of pure water. And if 3 water of 250 ml - 750 ml of water. And it will show the balance to the goal for the day, for example, 1100 ml.
You will also appreciate the following features of our drinking tracker:
1.Hydro calculator. Calculates your rate of water per day based on your weight and height.
2.Hydro balance. The tracker will remind you to drink after a certain time. The frequency of reminders, alarms and timer is configurable.
3.Journal of water consumption. Keep a record of drinking and maintain drinking regime.
4.The system of planning intake of water. It will help you lose weight during diet, give tips on how to speed up metabolism and increase the effect of losing weight.

Download free drinking app and you will feel such advantages:
• own animated mascot. He will communicate with you, ask about your successes, give tips on water intake;
• taking into account hydration tracker in drinks. As we mentioned above, far from all the liquid our body perceives as pure water. Drink what you want, add the amount in the application, and count the clean water that your body received as a result;
• system of reminders, alarms, push notifications and modal windows on timer. Set up the notification system in the widget, and do not miss a single drunk glass;
• personalized reminders. You will also receive non-standard reminders about water intake, some of them are tied to the time of day;
• disable weight display. Don't want someone to see your personal options? Disable their display;
• smart tips. The application not only calculates the rate of hydro per day, but also tells you how much is left to drink to the goal in detector;
• statistics of drinking. Shown in the diagram for the day, week and month;
• the ability to enter various drinks in various milliliters. Not a milliliter of liquid will be lost.

And remember that water is life! It will help you lose weight, detoxify the body, improve your well-being and bring your physical form in order. Also, if you regularly drink your norm and stay hydrated, you will maintain a normal blood sugar level, cleanse the body of toxins, avoid dehydration, and speed up the process of losing weight. It's time to improve your general health!
summary: Best hydration tracker app to keep your drinking regime and avoid dehydration.

title: Water Intake & Drink Water Notifier
description:
The important aspect for our long healthy life to keep up hydration level to improve our mental and physical health with young and fresh skin also it will help you in weight loss and metabolism level.
Physical, mental, and emotional benefits of keeping Hydration level up.
Help in weight loss
Increase blood volume and filter waste in blood
Joints and muscles performs better
Improve your physical performance during intense exercise
keep fit, clean and fresh
Strong mental attitude
In a busy routine life now a days its obvious that mostly every person  forget about essential daily needs e.g. hydration level,  to keep hydration level up with time by time need reminder in that busy routine which will help you to keep update and remind water intake for your hydration level.
Water intake & daily water reminder and water tracker will help you to gain the water drinking habit by reminding you to drink glass of water after the specified time intervals, also it will calculate the daily need of water in millimeter for a person that how much water you need on daily base by mentioning weight, workout(exercise), gender and age parameters, moreover the person can edit the time interval and reminder schedule e.g. if he/she need water reminder notification after 20 minutes, 30 minutes, 60 minutes or 180 minutes during the night or in day or in specific time.
By mentioning Glass size, bottle size or by adding custom size will improve the water intake calculation also it will be adding into your personal history user can check out the history on daily bases it will store history parameters e.g. time, glass or bottle size and date.
History part calculation is based on last day, week and on monthly bases with chart exploration for better understanding.
How to use it?
Open Setting Screen
Fill the required parameters e.g. weight, workout, gender, age and glass size.
After filling the setting parameters application will calculate your daily need of water.
You can turn ON/OFF notification 
Set the From and To time schedule parameters
Set the time intervals
After the above setting the application automatically generate reminder notification after the specified time intervals

title: Water Drink Reminder & Tracker - Track Hydration
description:
Now-a -days people forget to drink water in busy schedule and for this reason they are facing many kind of health issues. Lack of water in body produces various disease which makes to our body weak. This application provide reminder to drink water according to your body need.

Water Drink Reminder & Tracker also balance your body structure. People should drink water daily in proper way. This app remind you at what time you have to drink water and how many times you have to drink water in day, so that your body can complete water requirement.To prevent dehydration, you need to drink adequate amounts of water. There are many different opinions on how much water you should be drinking every day. Health authorities commonly recommend eight 8-ounce glasses, which equals about 2 litres, or half a gallon.

Health benefits of water
Water is your body's principal chemical component and makes up about 60 percent of your body weight. Your body depends on water to survive.

Every cell, tissue and organ in your body needs water to work properly. For example, water:

* Gets rid of wastes through urination, perspiration and bowel movements
* Keeps your temperature normal
* Lubricates and cushions joints
* Protects sensitive tissues

Water is your body's principal chemical component and makes up about 60 percent of your body weight. Your body depends on water to survive.

* Keeps your temperature normal

comments: I just don't drink enough water during the day, so I have been searching for a little app to help remind me to drink water. Looked at a lot and tried one out but it wasn't right for me. Then I found this great app! Water reminder....does what it says, reminds me to drink water.It works for me. Thanks!

Simply perfect and easy user interface. You can customize all types of glasses/cups of water including the amount of each type and it's design. On top of all that, it's reminder adapts it's next water drinking time dependending on the time you drank the last one or you can set set your time for water drinking, so if you drink water a little bit later it will adjust the next one. Great.

If you're too busy to remember having to drink water enough and regularly, don't worry, there's Drink Water Reminder to help you solve that problem.I also like how you can customize your cup because my water bottles are 15 oz, so I chose an 8oz cup. Lastly, I love the cute and lively design of this smart hydration reminder.

I was really bad at drinking enough fluids during the day. I could go almost a whole day at work and not drink anything because I got too busy. This app helped change that with hourly reminders to drink something, and I feel so much better off for it! i recommend this app.

Great Water Reminder App! Love it and use it every day. Very neat and intuitive. One request though: it would be great to be able to input a one-time custom cup size without saving it as a new cup. Love it, bought it!

title: D-Track - Dialysis Tracker
description:
Whether you perform dialysis in a unit or at home, be prepared the next time you talk to your doctor with D-Track. This kidney dialysis management app allows you to track your treatments, fluids, weights and blood pressures with ease from anywhere.


FEATURES
* Track Hemodialysis Fluid Loss/Gain
* Track Peritoneal Dialysis Exchanges (APD/CAPD)
* Track Standing/Resting Blood Pressure
* Track Heart Rate
* Track Fluid Consumed
* Track Weight
* Track Temperature
* Ability to export data as CSV



ABOUT
* Your data is kept on your device. Uninstalling will delete all your data.
* This app uses ads through the AdMob service.
* This app uses Google Analytics.
* Terms of Service ( https://cycosoft.com/dtrack/terms )

summary: Track your hemo or peritoneal dialysis treatments, fluid intake and BP readings.
recentChanges: Fix app launch bug
comments: Updated to latest (3Jan) version. Update successful, with no data loss. An option to back up directly to Dropbox or somewhere would be nice, but simply not losing the data is very welcome. Other than those previous update problems, D-Track is a very good and useful app. I appreciate the developer's attention to dealing with this major issue.

This app is a great concept, but some critical blind spots had me uninstall it and delete it from my app library. I don't have space for a full review, but I'll make a couple of recommendations. 1) Separate the treatment timer from the entering of weight and BP values. There are significant time lapses between taking pre-weight and inserting needles, and also from the end of treatment to taking the post-weight. This is unavoidable. 2) Add fields for blood pump speed, litres processed, Kt/V etc

I've just had this app for an hour and I really like it. It has all the items that I need to fill out each day. Options for: cycler and twin bag exchanges; standing and sitting bp; drop down menu for solution strength for each of the bags; weight; temperature. The only reason I haven't given it a 5* is I've only just got the app. Nov. 7, 2019 The new update erased previous information. I had clicked to reload previously saved amd nothing happened.
Excellent app for track commonly used data during dialysis. I think it would be a bonus if this app had a notes section to jot down key info.
Was able to open after installing the update. Looks good. But needs additions like UF Setting, UF Rate, Blood Flow, etc. Weight should be before and after treatment.

title: Drink Water Reminder - Watero Free
description:
What is Watero? 
Watero is a mobile application reminding to drink water. The application allows you to monitor the daily consumption of beverages that hydrate your body such as water, tea, juices, etc. There are also beverages in the drink base that affect dehydration (coffee, alcohol, etc.). The application informs you how much fluid you need to drink during the day to properly hydrate your body.

 Why you should drink water? 
Studies show that proper hydration improves mood. Do you often have a headache? Are you feeling weak You don't feel like anything? Do you still feel hungry? All this can be caused by dehydration. We recommend drinking plain water (mineral or tap water) to speed up your metabolism and get rid of excess kilos. Water perfectly cleanses your body through detoxification and protects against such ailments as diabetes or kidney stones. Thanks to Watero, you will ensure proper hydration of your body.

 Application features and functions 
- simple, clear and easy to use interface,
- a graph showing the daily goal and progress in achieving it,
- notifications with reminders to drink water,
- night mode during which you do not receive notifications
- a varied menu containing several drinks,
- the ability to choose the amount of water,
- automatic calculation of water demand depending on gender and weight,
- the ability to manually set the water demand,
- active day mode taking into account additional water demand,
- dark theme mode,
- the amount of water measured in ounces (oz) or milliliters (ml),
- full history with daily reports,
- tips for healthy drinking habits.

title: Calorie Counter by Lose It! for Diet & Weight Loss
description:
Lose It! is a calorie counter & food diary diet app that helps you stick to your diet and achieve weight loss that fits! Simply download the app, set your goals and track your diet, food and exercises to lose weight. Easily track macro, carb and calorie intake with Lose It! calorie counter & food diary app!

Since our launch in 2008 we have been featured in The Wall Street Journal, The Today Show, Men’s Health, Women’s Health, CNET, Buzzfeed, CNN, Shape, Good Morning America, and more.

• 80+ million pounds of weight lost by our members (and counting)
• 27+ million searchable food items in our comprehensive international food library database 
• 40+ million users who have started their weight loss journey with Lose It!
• 25+ macro nutrient, carb, calorie and health goals to choose from
• 3 days of calorie and diet tracking is all it takes to see a result in weight loss

Stay on track of your diet and calorie intake with Lose It! Calorie Counter. Whether it be a keto diet, vegan diet or anything in between, Lose It! will help you find weight loss that fits by tracking your macro, carb and calorie intake to reach your weight loss and health goals. Stop making excuses – start losing weight with Lose It!

HOW THE LOSE IT! CALORIE COUNTER & FOOD DIARY APP HELPS YOUR WEIGHT LOSS JOURNEY

Lose It! isn’t your average calorie counter and food & diary app. Lose It! uses the proven principles of calorie counting and tracking to help you succeed. To get started, input your profile details and we’ll calculate the daily calorie budget best for you. Next, easily track your food, weight, and activity and get ready to celebrate your weight loss victories. Gain insight on your macro, carb, protein, sugar, fat and overall calorie and food intake on a daily level. Stay on top of your keto, vegan, vegetarian or whole 30 diet! Change your calorie and diet habits and learn about your nutrition needs. 

LOSE IT! CALORIE COUNTER FEATURES

• Barcode Scanner – quickly scan food barcodes or search our database to track your carb, macro and calorie intake.
• Snap It – Want to know your carb count? Log food by simply taking a photo of your food. Just tap the camera icon for food tracking and calorie counting in a snap. 
• Track Nutrients – track more than just calories including macro, protein, water, carb, sugar, body measurements, sleep cycles, and more. Stay on top of your keto, vegan or vegetarian diet needs! Learn what nutrients you need along your weight loss journey.
• Fitness App Syncs – connect trackers, apps, and devices like Fitbit trackers, Misfit trackers, Garmin trackers, Withings scales, Google Fit, Healthkit, and more.
• Challenges – step up your game with fun weight loss, fruit/veggie, health and exercise challenges by yourself or with your friends.
• Meal Planning & Targets – meal targets help you calculate suggested macro, carb, protein and overall calorie intake. Customize your diet and eating for personalized weight loss!
• Patterns – learn about your food and calorie intake habits with our exclusive personal insights to identify what is hindering or helping your weight loss progress.
• Recipes – customize your diet and weight loss journey with breakfast, lunch, and dinner meals you create yourself. Find easy food recipes for your Keto diet, vegan diet, vegetarian diet, Whole 30 - or any diet!
• Workout Guides - library of workouts to help guide you to weight loss success. Weight loss is more than just a diet and food tracking! Get moving and work your way to a healthy weight & healthy living.

Download Lose It! Calorie Counter today and join our community of members helping us reach our mission to mobilize the world to healthy weight loss. No matter your diet needs or weight loss goals, Lose it! Calorie Counter can help you find weight loss that fits to achieve your health goals!

LOSE IT! SUBSCRIPTION PRICING & TERMS
Lose It! basic is free, but you can upgrade to Premium for additional features. 

Full terms: 
http://loseit.com/terms

recentChanges: We made a change based on member feedback - tapping on the ‘Mark your day as complete’ task on My Day will now automatically check the ‘Done logging’ box. As always, thanks for sharing your ideas with us!
comments: This app ticks all the boxes for me for a weight tracking app (I've tried many). It has a decent barcode scanner and a reasonably well curated database, option to save meals and recipes, and a breakdown of macronutrients you consumed in the free subscription. It doesn't try to solve all the world's problems and do it poorly. That's impressively hard to find! I also like the UI, it's pretty, intuitive and uncluttered.

Really love this app. I have used it for a month with no problems, but today I can't go to my goals without the app shutting down. Please fix this! Until today I would have given 5 stars. I've reported problem but haven't heard a response yet.

Bugs fixed. I'd like to add that the year subscription is totally worth it. When paired with GoogleFit I have lost 25 lbs in three months. App holds you 100% accountable when no one else can, if you cheat you cheat yourself out of weight loss. Follow your plan , exceed your goals and the weight will fall off. By the time you realize it it is already a habit and you are accounting for everything u consume. The app will inform u of the areas that need improvement.

Most nutritional information in this app is incorrect. For example, items like calories, carbohydrates and proteins are not always correct and in fact very can be far off. Where my actual carbohydrates are 180g, this app will tell me they are only 130g. This may have something to do with the fact that anyone can go in and adjust nutritional information. The app would be great otherwise but I cannot continue to use it or refer my clients because of the abundant false nutritional information.

Two updates now and calories still do not change when weight changes. I have emailed support, but I guess the engineers just don't care that their app does not work properly. Not sure what their focus is within the app, but they sure are not good a fixing things they screw up thats for sure. I given up on emailing. Seems to be a huge waste of time.

title: Fluid Restriction Manager App Free - Fluid Q Free
description:
**If you intend to input your fluid amounts in metric units, download "FluidQ Metric", a version of FluidQ that is optimized for use with metric values.**

The purpose of this Fluid Quantity Management App is to help you manage your MD ordered or registered dietitian recommended fluid restriction.  Good compliance with your fluid restriction may help with the management of cardiac diagnosis, dialysis treatments and to assist in hyponatremia treatment. This may contribute to a better quality of life and may help to reduce rehospitalizations resulting from non-compliance with Fluid Restrictions. Please do not start a fluid restriction without MD approval.  This app was designed by a registered dietitian with experience working with patients who are on fluid restrictions.

Features include:

*Input your daily fluid restriction and enter weight on up to a daily basis

*Easily keep track your daily fluids with useful information, such as a time stamp of when the entry was submitted, the percentage of your fluid restriction that each entry represents, and the amount of fluid you consumed at that time, represented in mLs.

*Viewing and editing of entries from the current date as well as past dates.

*Chart of fluid restriction history and consumption that you can show to your MD or RD to help them manage your fluid balances. 

*Chart of weight history

*Help buttons on each screen with clear, easy to comprehend directions

*Suggested fluid intake guides for six different fluid restrictions

This is the free version of Fluid Q. This app is ad-supported. It contains all of the features of the paid version of Fluid Q.

title: Drink Reminder - Water Tracker & Water Reminder
description:
Have you ever felt tired, headache, or even sick? One of the reasons that can cause fatigue and sickness is that you are not getting the necessary amount of water for your body. 70% of the body is water, 1 day you have to drink 2 - 3 liters of water, depending on the condition and location of each person, but the average is 2 liters of water a day.
Are you too busy with work, life and you forget that you have to recharge enough water during the day? Don't worry this app is here to do just that. "REMIND YOU TO DRINK". So how to drink when you use the whole drinking water, even coca or beer, coffee, tea? Do not worry, the application will calculate the amount of water you feed no matter what kind of water you use, even the soup you drink during your meal is considered drinking water.

DrinkingWater helps you determine the exact amount of water you need for your body when you provide enough data on your weight, height, age and gender.

Drinking water also helps you to choose the cup that you drink. It can be 200ml or 500ml or 1 liter ...

You can set a time for the app to remind you to drink water every day, and every 30 minutes, 60 minutes you'll need to refill a glass of water or the amount of water to make up for a long day of activity.

The benefits of drinking enough water are clear:
You will have a healthy body without sickness.
You have smooth skin because it replenishes the necessary amount of water for the body.
You keep your work efficiency high by adding enough water.
Detoxify the liver without having to work too much causing cirrhosis.
Body purification.


Main features of Daily Drink Reminder app:

Give the daily amount of water you need to drink as you stay fit
Your drinking cup options as well as what water you drink.
Remind the amount of water to drink after a period of time to get the amount you need to drink during the day.
Create daily reminders.
Statistics and advice for you after a period of using the application
Intuitive graph to see how much water you drink daily.
You can also turn off the daily water reminder if you are bothered or have already had enough water to drink (not recommended because you may miss out on water during the day)
Do you change body mass as your body gains or loses weight or height.

With the aim of giving users health, we hope the application will help people have a great health by providing enough water needed for the body. If you have any suggestions for better applications feel free to contact us so we can make this water reminder app even better.

Do not hesitate to rate us on the app. Your reviews and suggestions will help the app get better and better for users, for everyone's health.

title: Fastic: Fasting App & Intermittent Fasting Tracker
description:
The Fastic App – One of the most popular Intermittent Fasting Apps

If you’re interested in fat loss, muscle gain or better health, you too can benefit from the holistic lifestyle that is intermittent fasting. We’ve got everything to help you on your way to a healthier life – from a Step Counter, Water Tracker, Fasting Timer and Body Status, to Healthy Recipes and Daily Tips. Follow popular fasting plans for men and women, such as the 16:8 window or the Keto diet and become a Fasting Pro quickly and easily. Start now and download the Fastic intermittent fasting app for free!

😎 Free Start Intermittent Fasting

🎉 Fasting Timer – Tracks fasting window
🎉 12 different fasting plans
🎉 Body Status – Identifies and tracks key stages in your fasting journey
🎉 Water Tracker with reminder function
🎉 Step Counter – Monitors your step count
🎉 Blog – Educates you on all things intermittent fasting
🎉 Benefit from key features without need to register
🎉 Continuous app development
🎉 frequent feature updates
🎉 Suitable for both beginners & the more experienced
🎉 Suitable lifestyle change for both men and women
🎉 Compatible with building muscle & weight training
🎉 Stable and sustainable results versus yo-yo diet
🎉 Free of distracting advertising

🤝 Reach Your goals faster with Fastic-Plus

🥇 Recipe Book – Offers over 400 delicious wholesome recipes
🥇 Daily Challenges – Help stay on track with motivating challenges
🥇 Weekly Challenges – Offer a variety of fun tasks to build healthy habits
🥇 Videos – Offer expert tips and tricks
🥇 In-App Chat – Builds community through a 5-week workshop
🥇 Fasting Buddies – Connects you with Fastic friends to stay accountable
🥇 Social media Channel – Inspires you and keeps you in the loop
🥇 Expert guidance to reach your goals faster
🥇 Valuable insights to monitor your progress

⏰ Fasting with the Fastic App

• Reach your goals sustainably with IF
• Lose fat, gain muscle or get healthier effortlessly
• Increase your energy and vitality
• Learn to eat consciously and mindfully
• Stay away from calorie-counting
• Don’t suffer from the yo-yo effect
• Combine it with any other food or nutrition plan
• Combine it with diets like Paleo, Keto or Low-Carb
• Enjoy all your favourite foods without restricting yourself
• Achieve your ideal body type with minimal effort
• Nobel Prize-Winning Intermittent Fasting

🚀 Long-Term Benefits

• Achieve your ideal body type in the most natural and sustainable way
• Achieve your ideal body type effortlessly while sleeping
• Strengthen your immune system with your body’s self-healing mechanism
• Consciously boost fat loss through metabolism stimulation and body fat burning
• Detoxify your body through fasting-related cell-regenerating processes
• Refresh your life quality by activating your natural anti-aging process
• Reduce or prevent allergies and inflammations
• Feel more energetic and rejuvenated
• Improve your concentration and focus
• Improve the condition of your skin
• Improve the quality of your sleep

Fast according to your shedule

✅ Gentle – 12:12 | 13:11 | 14:10
✅ Moderate – 15:9 | 16:8 | 17:7
✅ Intense – 18:6 | 19:5 | 20:4

What are You waiting for?

Start your journey into a new and improved life.

Studies on intermittent fasting (IF): www.fastic.com/en/intermittent-fasting-studies

Fastic Plus 3-in-3 Guarantee: www.fastic.com/en/guarantee

Intermittent fasting entails a shift in eating habits. It is not suitable for pregnant/nursing women, children under 18 years of age or persons with diagnosed eating disorders. www.fastic.com/en/disclaimer

*Individual results may vary and are dependent on numerous factors.

comments: I am using the paid version and I love it! I love the reminders and the lessons. I especially love the recipes and the fact that you have a TON of vegetarian options. The only reason I rated it 4 stars is that recipes get removed! I plan my meals a week in advance and I went today to prepare one and the 3 of the recipes are gone! There also isn't an option to download a .pdf to save for later. Please fix this and i will rate 5 stars!

Great app. I've experimented with IF in the past, with great success. However, with COVID and working from home, it's a lot easier to slip up and eat whenever you want to. This app pops up periodically reminding me that I need to drink water. It's nice to have a reminder, which should prevent me from mindlessly eating when I'm not scheduled to. My first foray into IF was about 2 years ago, and I lost 85lbs in total. I'm not quite where I was before, but I'm still dealing with about 50 extra lbs. This app is highly recommended, as long as you use it as intended.

Great app, takes a little learning. I was initially confused by the words encouraging me to 'End Fasting' when I was only hours into current fast. This resulted in a few badly timed fast records, but the ability to edit fasting start and end times saved me. I often forget to record my water intake, despite the much appreciated reminders from the app. The retroactive edit ability for water intake does not allow me to click on a day and edit. No response when I try to select a day's water record.

Easy and Convenient app. I love that I can see my progress so easily!! I wish I could connect to my community though. It disappeared as quickly as it appeared???? I also wish I could communicate with my fasting buddies, at minimum send them an emoji or something. I use the paid version so I'm not sure what I'm getting that's any different than the free version... I don't use the recipes or the tools, I just use the trackers. All in all I'm happy I have the app though to stay on track.

Love this app. I'm using the free version. There are enough features to get you started on IF. You enter basic info about yourself & they suggest a plan. You can modify the IF hours. Cool feature shows start/stop times. During fast you can see at a glance how long you've fasted/and time left. Reminders to drink water w/place to log amount. Didn't rate 5 stars because I wear an off brand fitness tracker (not listed on app) so steps are not recorded & no way to manually enter steps taken.

title: Water Drinking Reminder
description:
Water Drink Reminder is an App that will remind you to drink enough water. It will also keep a record of your water intake on daily, monthly and yearly basis.

Water Drink Reminder will calculate how much water you should drink each day based on your personal details like age, weight and daily activity, but also lets you change that amount to suit your individual needs. 

Features:
* Water drinking reminder, to keep you hydrated through out the day
* Customized intake of water measure
* Tracks your Sleep times and calculates amount of water to intake all day
* Records all your hydration activity all life long

In our day-to day life, drinking water regularly can be challenging, despite its numerous health benefits. This water tracker app makes it easier to stay hydrated. It may even help you lose weight and prevent certain illnesses.

title: Aqua Alert
description:
Do you know that drinking enough aqua regularly is a very important for our health? It can clear up your skin and even helps you to lose weight. So do you drink enough water everyday or do you always forget about it?

Aqua Alert app will remind you to drink aqua regularly and develop useful habit to drink aqua and other liquid everyday. It is simple and very easy aqua reminder app with clear and intuitive interface, detailed aqua log and pretty nice charts of your daily, weekly and monthly water balance. Just set once your aqua alert schedule, receive notifications and drink aqua.

Aqua Reminder app already contains water field to log it. But unlike most of the other aqua alert apps the main advantage of this aqua tracker is the ability to create your own fields. Just add into your aqua reminder tea, coffee, your favorite soda sparkling water, juice, beer, wine or whatever else you want to drink and log it. In this way you can use this aqua log app as any liquid intake tracker. Keep track of your water and any other liquid intake history in one place and manage your health with the help of the best aqua alert app.

Aqua Alert Water Reminder app free features:

- Set your aqua reminder every hour or whenever you want
- Create your own custom aqua tracker fields
- Add useful and informative description to each of them
- Drag and drop fields to sort them
- Delete unused fields or move them to archive in order to maintain history
- Analyze your aqua diary on graphs and via history log
- Export your aqua journal as a spreadsheet (.csv) file
- Share your aqua diary with friends on Facebook and Twitter

Additional features:

- Weight Diary
- Body Sizes Diary
- Heart Rate and Blood Pressure Diary
- Exercise Diary
- Pedometer

Surprise! Just now as a gift along with the downloading this aqua reminder app you are getting a free trial 14 days access to all of premium features to track other important health and fitness parameters. Just try this beautiful aqua alarm app to see how easy and useful it is!

Aqua Alert Water Reminder app is a free and must have assistant that helps you to keep track of your daily water intake. Aqua alarm app supports all the most common liquid units (ml and fl oz) and it is perfect for both men and women, for young and for elderly, for breastfeeding moms or people with health problem, for athletes, bodybuilders and models.

Just way to many ads!! I love app, I would even pay for it but that feature doesn't work. The ads even pop up when I am not using the app.
Definitely find it easier to drink more now and I like the challenge of drinking more than my daily amount.
Great user interface bit the ads are annoying popups and glitchy.
I tried other drink water apps and this is the best one i tried. I like it a lot!

title: Water Tracker
description:
Install this amazing water tracker app on your android phone and keep track of how much water you drink throughout the day.  Water is an important and life-sustaining for the survival of everyone. And to maintain a healthy lifestyle, it is a must to track your water intake.
 
Benefits:
 
-          Keep track of your water intake

-          Helps to lose weight

-          Gain healthy Skin

-          Reduce the risk of heart disease

-          Increase immunity

-          Better body metabolism

 
How to Use the Application?
 
Just download the application and install it on your android phone. Once the installation is completed, it will ask for your details viz. Name, Age, Gender, Blood Group, Height, Weight (SI/US units) etc.
 
Record your water consumption for ready reference and enter your daily water consumption readings in the application. This way you will be able to analyze your water intake anytime and ensure an adequate amount of water intake.

title: Water Drink Reminder : Healthy water intake goal
description:
Proper hydration keeps your skin healthy and helps you lose weight.

❓Do you always forget to drink water regularly?
❓Are you in good shape?
You need Water Drink Reminder - a water tracker app to help you develop good habits of water drinking!

This water tracker app reminds you to drink water every day to keep you hydrated.

Enter your current weight, and Water Drink Reminder will help you determine how much water your body needs every day. Remember to update the app each time you drink a cup of water. Then the app will remind you when it's time for another drink. Hydration helper not only tracks what you drink, but also reminds you when it's time for another drink.

FEATURES:
💧 Water tracker that will remind you when and how much water to drink throughout the day
💧Customized cup and standard (oz) or metric (ml) units
💧 You can set your start and end time to drink water for each day
💧 Graph and logs of your schedule
💧 Syncs weight data with Google Fit.
💧 Syncs weight and drink water data with S Health.
💧 You can login through your Google account.
💧You can backup and restore your drinking data through the water tracker.

Water Reminder is always here by your side, calculates how much water you need and reminds you to drink water on time. Try to record your daily water intake and keep a well water balance with hydration tracker and water drinking reminder now.

title: iTrackBites - Easy Weight Loss Diet and Tracker
description:
Your Simple & Affordable Weight Loss Solution is here. Eat the food you love and still achieve your weight loss goals with your personalized weight loss plan! 
 
Achieve Real Results in 3 SIMPLE STEPS =>
 
> STEP 1: Get a Personalized Weight Loss Plan: -> Answer a few simple questions about yourself, your cravings and your diet, and get a personalized weight loss plan catered to helping you achieve your weight loss goals.
 
> STEP 2: Track What You Eat: -> the iTrackBites app makes it easy to track your food throughout the day. Search +500,000 recipes, scan barcodes for +1 million products, and browse millions of foods including popular restaurant menus. 

> STEP 3: Lose Weight and Share with the Community: -> See your progress immediately and share your successes, questions and enthusiasm with our best in class community that will help you stay focused on your weight loss journey  

Log foods, track weight loss and reach your diet goals with iTrackBites, your personal food tracker and weight loss journey partner. 

Not all weight loss journeys are the same, your weight loss program shouldn't be either. With iTrackBites, we’ll help you pick the weight loss plan that will work best for you by choosing from our five different weight loss plans. Whether you’re focused on limiting sugar, carbs, calories or you want help with portion control, iTrackBites has got you covered!

With iTrackBites – Choose healthy diet goals > Track meals > Lose weight!

We’ll help you stay on track with your weight loss journey thanks to our easy to use weight loss plans and calorie counter, so you can enjoy weight loss that makes you look good and feel great! 

Lose weight, log workouts and get healthy - 5 ways iTrackBites can help you reach your weight loss goals:
1. Track calories and activity with our food tracker - Focus on your weight loss plan by logging meals and workouts
2. Log foods, get nutrition reports, monitor your activity, and much more! Keep smashing your weight loss goals by using our detailed food, activity, and nutrition reports
3. A customized weight loss plan - Choose a diet plan that’s right for you. From limiting sugar to cutting carbs, use our calorie counter to track meals and meet your diet goals
4. More than just a food tracker and calorie counter - Join our supportive community, where you can build on your healthy long-term goals by trading tips with other members … and don’t forget, the official iTrackBites Coaches are there to support, guide, and motivate you.
5. Lose weight, feel great! Log foods, track your workouts and follow your diet plan all using your phone. 

Whether you want to log your workouts, get nutrition reports or simply lose weight - make iTrackBites 100% tailored to your lifestyle and goals.

Download iTrackBites today to track calories and kickstart your personal weight loss plan.

Check out of amazing features:
√ Fitbit, Apple Watch and Apple HealthKit Integration (Pro)
√ +500,000 Recipes (Pro)
√ Voice Tracking (Pro)
√ Syncs securely across multiple devices
√ Use our online community feature
√ Best weight tracker with Milestone achievement motivations for each goal!
√ Online food & restaurant database with millions of foods and restaurant items (Pro)
√ Choose food items from our Pocket Guide database
√ Choose food items from the USDA database
√ Premium Restaurant, Beer, and Snack guides (Pro)
√ Recipe Builder to easily create & share recipes (Pro)
√ Scan barcodes for over 1,000,000+ UPCs
√ Favorite foods & activities for easy tracking
√ Works for all Food Score based systems or use Calories
√ Check out the screenshots & see for yourself

Visit our website: https://itrackbites.com 
Contact us for help: android-support@itrackbites.com

recentChanges: Bug fixes and performance improvements.
comments: In general, a really good app with lots of functionality. It would be nice if the font stood out more. I feel like I'm always squinting at the screen. Also, entering numbers with scroll selectors is like threading a needle every time. WW has a option to tap on the number and type the data. If you could add this I'd be so appreciative! It would also be nice to be able to 'like' replies in Community and to reply to people by name.

I've been having trouble with the app with the new upgrade. When I try to enter info on a new food or add a recipe, I get a blank screen. This is a pain and hope it fixed soon. I reported it on 10/23, but haven't heard anything back. I tried to take a picture of the screen to show you, but it won't allow me

You have to pay for Pro to get access to key functionality like recipe builder. Pro is heavily advertised but it isn't made clear only US brands & restaurants are supported so UK members get no benefit from this being unlocked. Being able to post in the community is also unlocked but there is no tagging functionality so it's almost impossible to have a conversation with someone. You also can't search for other members. In databse pre populated veg is by cups not by item unless added manually .
I love this program however, the update 2 days ago messed up typing on the community boards. You can't see what u type. Others are having the same issue too. Help!!!
The text is much too light to read! Too many steps to find a food. Should be more like the app lose it. But please, make the text darker.

title: Calorie Counter - MyFitnessPal
description:
Whether you want to lose weight, tone up, get healthy, change your habits, or start a new diet MyFitnessPal has you covered. Our members have lost over 200 million pounds and 88% of people who track for at least 7 days on MyFitnessPal lose weight. Sign up for FREE and start living a happier and healthier life today!

See for yourself why MyFitnessPal is the world’s most popular health and fitness app.

▌TRACKING FOOD IS FAST AND EASY 
■ Biggest Food Database -- 11+ million foods in our database including global items and cuisines. 
■ Barcode Scanner -- Simply scan barcodes to log foods. 4+ million barcodes recognized. 
■ Recipe Importer -- Easily import the nutrition information for the recipes you cook.
■ Restaurant Logging -- Quickly log menu items from your favorite restaurants.
■ Food Insights -- Learn how to make healthier choices about the foods you eat. 
■ Personalized Experience -- Create your own foods, recipes, and meals and save favorites. 
■ Calorie Counter -- We automatically calculate the calories in your foods, meals and recipes.
■ Macro Tracker -- We automatically calculate the macros (carbs, fat, protein) in your foods, meals and recipes.
■ Track All Nutrients -- Calories, macros (carbs, fat, protein), sugar, fiber, cholesterol, vitamins, and more.
■ Customize Your Diary -- Log breakfast, lunch, dinner and snacks or create your own meals. 
■ Water Tracking -- Log water in cups, ounces or ml. We save your recently logged amounts.

▌REACH YOUR GOALS
■ Choose A Goal -- We support weight loss, weight gain, and weight maintenance goals.  
■ Goal Setting -- Create your own goals or let us create personalized goals for you, including calorie and macros goals.
■ Change Habits -- It's almost like having a nutrition coach right inside your pocket.

▌LOG YOUR EXERCISE AND STEPS 
■ Connect 50+ Apps & Devices -- Syncing your workouts is easy and automatic.
■ Choose From 350+ Exercises -- Or create your own exercises and workouts. 
■ Log Cardio Exercises -- Including running, walking, biking, swimming, yoga, pilates and more. 
■ Log Strength Exercises -- Including sets, reps, and weight per set. 
■ Track Steps -- Set a daily step goal and see a graph of your step history. 
■ We connect with all your favorite apps and devices -- Including Fitbit, Jawbone UP, Garmin, MapMyFitness, Runkeeper, Strava, Runtastic, Misfit, Withings, HealthKit, UA Record and many more!

▌GET SUPPORT AND MOTIVATION 
■ Add Friends -- Connect with friends for an extra layer of support and accountability.
■ Join Our Community -- Find motivation, support, tips, and advice in our active forums. 
■ Newsfeed Updates -- Share your accomplishments and see friend’s progress in the newsfeed.

▌CELEBRATE YOUR SUCCESS 
■ Chart Your Progress -- Stay motivated with a graph of how you’re improving over time.
■ Progress Photos -- Add photos to your weight entries to see and celebrate your progress. 
■ Nutrition Reports -- View a history of your calories, macros, and nutrient intake. 
■ Share Your Progress -- Help inspire friends and family members on their own health journey.

Download MyFitnessPal and start living a happier and healthier life today!

For our full terms and conditions and our privacy policy, please visit: https://account.underarmour.com/privacy?locale=en

recentChanges:
Whether you want to log your lowest weight in years, your first run in weeks, or your heart healthy afternoon snack, we know you count on MyFitnessPal to be working smoothly.

Want to try new features before everyone else? Join our beta program: https://undrarmr.co/334Jhn7

We hope you enjoy and happy tracking!
comments: The step synching with Samsung Health has stopped working. I thought it was a problem with my phone initially, but as my food entries were synching I realise it's a MFP issue and not the first time. So annoying! 16/10/20 One week later and still not working. What's going on? 29/10/20 Still not synching with Samsung Health. Why is it taking so long? 31/10/20 The new release is not working properly at all, it only syncs a fraction of the total number of steps taken. Just awful!

**UPDATE: I have been using the app since last July 2019. It's a great tool. I have lost 70 lbs. on the keto diet since then, I couldn't have been so successful without it! Helps keep me on track with my goals. **Step tracker is fixed! Thank you! I will say that it was a little frustrating getting an email(actually several) that said my problem was resolved, when it wasn't... their internal term for "yes, we know it's a problem and we're working on it" But it's fixed now, I am happy. !

When it works it helps keep me motivated, and there's a great database. However it wants to know why I haven't logged lunch at 8:10 AM (and yes my settings are on the correct time zone). It locks up often, failing to allow me to add goods in a timely manner. If the glitches don't improve I'll try a different app.

Downloaded the app on the recommendation of my trainer and am finding it very useful. The only frustrating part is trying to find certain foods when tracking meals. There is almost too much choice which makes it frustrating to have to scroll through a massive list if what is typed in doesn't match exactly. Other than that this app has been great. Still debating whether to pay for the premium features but only because I'm cheap.

It used to be amazing. Now, it's riddled with premium forced on you and location tracking prompts that don't stop with no way to say 'never show again.' it's not longer simple to use. Update: the intrusive ads are rediculous. You should not get an ad when you hit ad food, or other important actions. They are put in places to seemingly trick you into clicking them - they often appear just as you are going to naturally push a button.

title: Water Drink Reminder
description:
Water Drink Reminder app reminds you to drink enough water every day to keep you hydrated.

Enter your current weight, and Water Drink Reminder will help you determine how much water your body needs every day. The app will remind you when it's time for another drink. 

Drinking enough water keeps your skin and nails healthy and helps you stay in shape and keep fit.
Drinking water helps prevent kidney stones, keeps you hydrated and clears up your skin.

Water Drink Reminder Key Features:

- Remind you when and how much water to drink throughout the day
- Set your wake up and sleep time to drink water for each day
- Graph and logs of date record
- Sync weight and drink water data with S Health
- Everyday Drink Water Reminder
- Records of Daily Water Intake
- Water Cup Customization
- No reminder during sleep time

In our day-to day life, drinking water regularly keeps your skin healthy and helps you lose weight.

title: DrinkWater
description:
DrinkWater allows you to record your water consumption each day by clicking just one button. Drink a glass of water, press the big yellow button, and observe your progress. Nice and simple! No more complicated tracking system that distracts you from the main focus, your health and hydration.
 
If you don’t remember whether you logged your drink of water or not, check the time indicator at the bottom of the screen, which displays the last time you recorded your drink of water.

And if you press it by mistake? Just press “Oops” and you will  reverse the progress by 1 glass, updating the time too.

The app resets itself at 3 am local time.

The app is available in English, French, German, Italian, Portuguese, Russian, Spanish, and Urdu and is installed in the language of your phone. (Default is English).

Stay healthy!

title: Aqualarm - Drink Water Reminder
description:
Aqualarm - Easy to use drink water reminder and tracker to be healthy and hydrated! :)

Aqualarm uses smart notifications to remind you when it’s time to drink. It tells you how much water you should drink a day and rewards you, if you reach your daily goal. Playfully encourages you to consume fluid. You can create any kind of drink, like water, tea or fruit juice.

💧 Drink water playfully 🌈
In Aqualarm you have your own Starfish to whom you give water and you make her happy when you are drinking water. Your Starfish is the happiest when you reach your daily fluid intake goal, for which you are rewarded. You can use your reward to dress your Starfish up and to buy cute fishes into the huge aquarium that forms the background of the app. The more water you drink, the more swimming fishes you may have.

🥛 Drink whatever you want ☕
Aqualarm is more than a drink water reminder. Besides default drinks you can also create any drink you want, such as tea, fruit juice, milk or soft drinks. Set if the drink is not consisting of water only or has a dehydrating effect. Decide whether you want to use metric (ml) or British derived (oz) units of measurement. There are countless glasses, mugs, cups and bottles to choose from, drink either a cup of tea or a bottle of water.

🔔 Smart drink water reminder ⏰
Aqualarm notifies you when it’s time to drink, but it never disturbs your dream. It takes into account if you are working night shifts and you are sleeping during the day. You can decide which drink should be displayed in the reminder notification, so you can immediately drink the chosen drink by tap it. Set how often you want to receive drink water reminder notification. Decide to be notified only if you haven’t drank enough by yourself.

⚽ Customize your daily goal 🥅
Aqualarm tells you how much water you should drink a day based on your attributes, your physical activity and the current temperature. Moreover, it takes into account if you are pregnant, breastfeeding or even feverish. You can even manually set your daily goal if you want to drink more or less a day.

📊 Keep track of your intake 💦
Keep track of what and when you drank exactly. Study your weekly, monthly and yearly fluid intake habits in order to create a healthy fluid intake routine.

🏆 Reach milestones 🎁
The more water you drink on a regular basis, the more milestones you reach, for which you get extra reward.

❤ Take care of your cute Starfish ⭐
Drink water regularly to keep your Starfish happy. Give her a name, change her look and dress her up using your reward received for reaching your daily fluid intake goal.

🐠 Let swim your own fishes 🐟
The background of the Aqualarm is a gigantic aquarium where you can put cute fishes. Your fishes are swimming back and forth while they are invigorating the water. As you drink more and more water, and you live healthier, your own aquarium will become even more populous and full of life.

🥰 We appreciate it if you found the Aqualarm useful. Thank you very much if you rate the Aqualarm, because your rating helps us a lot to make the Aqualarm even better. 🤩

If you want to send us a message, if you have any questions, ideas or suggestions, please feel free to contact us at info@aqualarm.radsoft.hu e-mail address!

You accept the End User License Agreement (aqualarm.radsoft.hu/eula) by downloading the Aqualarm. Please note that the application may use the Internet, for example, when you want to send us feedback, which may incur charges from your mobile service provider. Please note that the features described above are working in case of proper use only.

title: Drink to lose Belly Fat
description:
Diet Drink to lose Belly Fat

Get a flat belly without exercise. Lose weight and detoxify your body with this natural diet drink.
This easy recipe will not only help you get a flat belly and get hydrated, it will also help you flush out toxins, burn fat and lose weight fast.

Please remember, any kind of store-bought appetite suppressant can be dangerous and may not necessarily help you with your weight loss goals.
There are so many weight loss recipes out there it can be very misleading.
A healthy diet, exercise and self-control are key factors to successful weight loss and for getting a flat belly.

Please make sure you use filtered water to get the full benefits.

Let’s look at the ingredients in this flat belly recipe:

Ingredients:-

1. Two to Three Garlic Cloves.
2. Luke warm water.
3. Honey.
4. Freshly sliced Lemon.

Method of Preparation:--

1. Squeeze freshly cut lemon into like warm water after taking seeds and mix Honey to it.
2. Chew Garlic Cloves first and then take this Mixture.
3. Or Blend the garlic cloves with this mixture and Drink daily on Empty stomach.

Tip to lose fat Fast: - Drink at least two to three liters of water to loose unwanted fat.

FAQ of Water World - Drink Water Reminder & Water Tracker:

    Water is a basic need of human beings and human body to save the body from dehydration. Every person needs to drink Specific limit in a day for their health. title: Water Drink Reminder - Alerts Water Intake Tracker
description:
Water Drink Reminder reminds you to drink enough water. Proper hydration keeps your skin healthy and helps you lose weight.
Do you drink enough water?
Do you always forget to drink water regularly?
Are you in good shape?
You need Water Drink Reminder - a water tracker app to help you develop good habits of water drinking! This water tracker app reminds you to drink water every day to keep you hydrated.
Just enter your current weight, and Water Drink Reminder will help you determine how much water your body needs every day. Remember to update the app each time you drink a cup of water. Hydration helper not only tracks what you drink, but also reminds you when it's time for another drink.

In our day-to day life, drinking water regularly can be challenging, despite its numerous health benefits. This water tracker app makes it easier to stay hydrated. It may even help you lose weight and prevent certain illnesses.

comments: I love the service but don't like the app. Doesn't accept my email. Tells me that my email is invalid even though I used it to log into my account since I used this service. I guess this app is not for Sparkletts customers therefore a bogus app. UNINSTALLING!
I can't get the app to work. It says that my email address is invalid. Then I'll put the app on my iPad and it won't even open. It's defective
Just downloaded the app and it tell me to sign in not sign up. So of coarse I can't sign in because I haven't given it a password or set it up

UPDATE: Though new features were added, there is still a lot of improvements needed. First and foremost, ease of use. When creating an app, you should follow the rule of three - a customer should be able to get to any screen within three clicks. Additionally, when you arrive at a screen, you should be able to back out and initialize previous screen. This doesn't happen with a few screens. Add to Order is one example. When you back up, it takes you to the home screen, not view scheduled order.

Great service, bad app. This app needs to have all the functions of the website. You can't pay your bill, add extra deliveries, or even see any account info other than your delivery address. You can edit your recurring order & that's about it. I'm a longtime customer and I'm happy the company is developing an app, but right now it definitely needs work.

title: Water Reminder-Daily Water Drinking Tracker no ads
descriptionHTML:
The proper balance of water is very important for your health. Did you know that the human body consists of 60% of water? And how much water do you drink every day? Our daily drinking water hydration tracker is a water meter, a simple reminder of water intake, that tracking your drinking water, monitoring your drinking water and calculating your daily water intake to help you be healthy.

Do you want to be in shape? To be healthy? Accelerate metabolism and lose weight in a short time? With water hydration reminder, you can start now! Just drink a glass of water! Our body balance tracker will motivate you to drink water every day on a schedule. Also, a water meter will allow you to keep a diary of water consumption, indicate the time of drinking water, and the amount of water that you drink.

Features:

1) Water Calculator – Automatically calculates your recommended daily water intake based on your gender and weight. 2) Water drinking reminder – Water reminder app will remind you to drink water during the day at desired intervals so you never get thirsty and experience dehydration. 3) Statistics – Drink Water Reminder app keeps track of your daily water intake

Water Reminder is one of the most popular apps for tracking water usage. A water tracking app helps you track how much water you should drink. Also, with Water Reminder Tracker you can monitor water consumption and achieve your goals. Did you forget to drink water? Don’t worry, our water minder will send you water aqualert!

Drink water app will track daily water intake using a single tap water logging. It prevents dehydration by reminding you when you forget to drink water, so you never get thirsty. Would you like to experience a natural H2O body cleanse and have a healthy skin and healthy nails in a natural way, while getting free kidney stone prevention and diabetes prevention?

The benefits of drinking water:
Why is it important to keep track of how much water you drink?
1. Dehydration harm you! Proper hydration it is a source of good mood well-being;
2. Regular water drinking contributes to weight loss. Also, a little hint for you: It is more beneficial to drink cold water because your body needs to spend more calories to heat water to body temperature;
3. Water speeds up the metabolism;
4. Water relieves stress and fatigue;
5. Regular water hydration helps remove toxins from the body;
6. Water moisturizes the skin and helps to get rid of rashes once and for all;
7. Balanced water intake tracking reduces the risk of kidney stones;
8. You will be healthy when you drink water! Water drinking tracker will help you to improve the immune system and reduces the risk of cancer;
9. Water is a natural remedy for headaches;
10. Regular water drinking has a positive effect on performance;
11. Daily water intake tracking helps digestion;
12. Stay in shape and keep fit; water is calorie free
13. Water balance maintained is essential for life. Because water is life!

NOTE: Our body water balance tracker is a regular drinking water reminder. Water Reminder Tracker is not a medical app! Consult your doctor if you want to use it for medical purposes.

Do you forget to drink water regularly? Install daily Water Reminder, drink water, lose weight, stay hydrated and be healthy!
