recentChanges: * Various bug fixes and improvements applied.
comments: Was worth 5 stars in my opinion, but noted that now it lacks some features that it used to have. These include a heart rate monitor. My samsung watch still has the application, but now does not record my heart rate at all. It also has a problem with barometric pressure, and doesn't read that any longer either. Wondering if it's the age of my watch, or just a bad update, that stopped these functions working....Please Advise...🙂

The app isn't the same without the weight management widget; I feel that, in my humble opinion, it is an extremely vital component that needs to be brought back in future updates. Moreover, for some reason, the latest update on my device (android) has resulted in my steps not being properly counted. Finally, I am being a bit nit-picky here, but the green colour scheme needs to go.....If you could fix those things (especially the weight management thing), that would be swell.

I used it before on my phone during the beginning of the first UK lockdown to keep me fit, and it sure did! I was more aware of what I was eating because I would record it, I recorded all the exercises I did because I wanted to do well for burning calories every day. Only thing stopping from giving 5 stars is it's not the most accurate way for measuring steps however overall if you are truthful to the app, you can monitor being healthy in a positive way and stay in "good" for calorie intake.

The calories in/out was taken away. Not a fan. Also the women's feature is powered by the app Glow...but it can't connect to the actual Glow app. I don't understand why you wouldn't just have the apps connect? I'm also disappointed with the water tracker. I wish I could just put in how many ounces instead of being confined to the one glass=8.4oz. It's just not accurate enough. If I drink a 12 oz can of sparkling water I can't put it in because im limited it 8.4 oz. Very lacking in many areas.

I agree with the other review, all of the sudden the app is not recording the steps from my Active watch and it is very inaccurate, messages and calls are also not registering Details use to be pretty accurate but something has changed. I tried all the recommended "fixes" and it still didn't work. I have discovered that updating the samsung health app through my watch app corrected the issue and now my watch and app are in sync once again.

title: EyeOnWater
description:
EyeOnWater allows you to connect to supported water utility accounts and see your latest water usage. Understand how much water you use, detect leaks, and discover trends for when you use the most water.

- Quickly view your recent water usage with a two week comparison.
- View detailed water usage history by day, week, month, and year.
- Discover your short and long term water usage trends.
- Detect leaks and reduce water waste.
- Easily contact your water utility.


Who can use the app:

EyeOnWater is available to customers of supported utilities. Enter your zip code after downloading the app to see if your water utility is supported.

Water usage information is provided by your utility through BEACON Customer Engagement, a service provided by Badger Meter, Inc. If your water utility is not listed in the app and you would like to see them added, contact customer service at your water utility.

title: Flud - Torrent Downloader
description:
Flud is a simple and beautiful BitTorrent client for Android. The power of BitTorrent protocol is now in the palm of your hands. Share files with ease from your phone/tablet. Download files directly to your phone/tablet.

Features :
* No speed limits on downloads/uploads
* Ability to select which files to download
* Ability to specify file/folder priorities
* RSS feed support with automatic downloading
* Magnet link support
* NAT-PMP, DHT, UPnP (Universal Plug and Play) support
* µTP (µTorrent Transport Protocol) , PeX (Peer Exchange) support
* Ability to download sequentially
* Ability to move files while downloading
* Supports torrents with large number of files
* Supports torrents with very big files (Note: 4GB is the limit for FAT32 formatted SD cards)
* Recognizes magnet links from the browser
* Encryption support, IP filtering support. Proxy Support for trackers and peers.
* Has option to download on WiFi only
* Ability to change theme (Light and Dark)
* Material design UI
* Tablet optimized UI

Many more features coming soon...

Note: On Android KitKat (Android 4.4), Google has removed the ability for apps to write to external SD card. This is not a bug in Flud. You can only download in folder Android/data/com.delphicoder.flud/ on your external SD on KitKat. Please note that that folder is deleted when Flud is uninstalled.

Help translate Flud in your language so others can enjoy it too! Join the translation project here:
http://delphisoftwares.oneskyapp.com/?project-group=2165

We're happy to announce that the paid ad-free version of Flud is now available for download. Search for "Flud (Ad free)" in the Play Store.

You feedback is very important. Don't hesitate to drop us a mail if you find any bug or you would like to see a new feature in the next version.

If you are giving less than 5 stars, please leave a review telling us what you didn't like in the app.

Privacy policy: https://www.iubenda.com/privacy-policy/49710596

title: Water Reminder - drink water on time daily
description:
Water drinking reminder alarm is a water drink reminder or daily water intake Alarm app, which enables us to know the exact water intake based on our age and weight, App for water reminder to drink water as per our needs.

Make Water as your best friend, By drinking water on time one will get the innumerable benefits of drinking water: Relief from fatigue, Weight loss, glowing skin, Heartburn etc... 

Drink Water Reminder free app, a hydration app: water drinking reminder with water tracker free. This drink water app free is also a water tracker free app reminds you to drink daily water and take a deep breath with the help of Drink Water Reminder & Tracker free - water drinking reminder.

Water Reminder is not only water drinking reminder but also a water tracker app that can help you develop a good habit to drink water on time daily and ensure daily regular and enough water intake!

This Water Tracker: Water Drinking Reminder App will help you to keep track of water intake per day! It also helps you to fulfill your recommended daily water intake goal! 

Water Drinking Reminder App allows you to take a backup of your water intake chart. So if you change your device then also you can keep a track on your daily water intake goal easily!

The Water Drinking Reminder app will remind you to drink water every day. This app lets you tailor your reminders to specific timings of your choosing and helps you build a daily schedule. 


* Key Features include:

➺ Easy to use, beautiful interface.
➺ Tracker water history
➺ Can adjust the amount of drinking water in the past.
➺ Set a desired goal for Water Consumption & keep track of your daily water consumption
➺ Calculates your daily water intake, display it in a water intake chart!
➺ Based on gender, weight will let you know how much water should drink a day.
➺ Diverse menu of nearly 20 different drinks.
➺ Water report for weekly, monthly, yearly Water Consumption goal achievement!
➺ Smart reminder: time mode go to bed so you don't get drink water reminder.

title: Water Intake - drink, hydrate!
description:
Yet another "Drink Water/Hydrate/Eight Cups a day" app.

What is different for this one? It lets YOU choose when you are done for the day! I found no other application on the market that does not change days on midnight.

This application helps you keep track of how much water you drank during a day. I have a kidney problem, so it is crucial to watch my water intake. Hope it helps you too.

summary: Water Intake - make sure you drink enough water!
recentChanges:
Library updates
Slight change to the main progress bar
comments: I'm on a fluid restricted diet,  and none of the other apps I found would accommodate me.  I was actually excited when I found this app.  I had resigned myself to pen and paper, but then This app came along.  It's perfect in it's simplicity, and I think If I had listed the features I needed, this would have been the "custom design" for what I was asking for.  I love how you can pre-program the QTY sizes to some of the unusual capacities  that you may use regularly.  Thank you for such an amazing app, I'm still smiling at how well it works for me!
Been looking for a app like this for a while. I also have kidney issues and keeping track of my water intake is not always easy
I have to intake 3 liters fluid daily and this app is the easiest way to keep track through the day. It's the best app of all water trackers I've tried! Delightfully simple, quick to update.
You dont need more than this. Very simple and customizable.  You could and option for notifications but its not essential.
Simple and clean.

title: Drink Water Reminder Hydration Log
description:
Do you forget drinking enough water daily? Are you on medication and doctor recommended you to drink lots and lots of water daily? This beautifully designed app lets you set your daily water need and reminds you when you need a glass of water.

According to studies our body loses around 2.5 liters water every day. In order to keep our body hydrated and restore the water balance of the body, we need to balance it by consuming more water daily to stay healthy.

If the daily water intake is not enough we may suffer from rough skin, headaches, fatigue, lack of energy which may lead up 
to even more serious consequences like a stroke or a heart attack.

Most significant benefits of keeping a normal water balance are:

•    A speedy metabolism

•    Flushes out toxins

•    Healthy kidneys that prevent kidney stones and other problems

•    Cope with headaches and digestive issues

•    Helps us to lose and maintain weight

•    The properly hydrated body enables the brain function properly

Keeping in mind all the significance of keeping a hydrated body, it is extremely important to drink water and to maintain water balance in the body. Drink Water Reminder Hydration Log is designed to serve that purpose.

Just set your daily water goal and the time intervals for reminding. The app will then remind you with notifications at those intervals that you have set for reminding to take water. The great visual graphical representation will show the user how much he/she drank today, yesterday, last week and last month.

How much water do you need to drink daily? Leave that to the app. The app will allow you to set your gender, weight, daily workout routine. Based on the given info the app will calculate your daily need or instead you can manually set your daily water goal!

Functions of Drink Water Log Application:

- Notification Reminder that will not let you forget your next glass of water

- Easy, robust, intuitive and stylish user interface

- The daily calculation that your body needs the amount of water

- Choose from different water cup sizes

- Graphical representation to show you the past water intake record
